SkillList.Name: Shared Hatred
SkillList.SkillDesc: When Gepard is downed, Bronya immediately takes action and becomes Enhanced, increasing her SPD. When in this state, Bronya will summon even more Silvermane Cannoneers.

SkillList.Name: Tacit Teamwork
SkillList.SkillDesc: Gepard and Bronya take turns switching between the Main Attacker and Support state. When in the Main Attacker state, their Toughness Protection is removed and they take normal actions. When in Support state, their SPD is reduced, they gain Toughness Protection, and they can only use Coordinated Reinforcement and Combat Redeployment.

1005010.Name: Cocolia, Mother of Deception
1005010.Introduction: After being assimilated by the overflowing Fragmentum energy of the Stellaron, the Supreme Guardian transforms into a singer able to control Imaginary Energy and the mouthpiece of its promised "new world."

SkillList.Name: Bone-Shattering Cold
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Ice DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Soulrend Coldstream
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Ice DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Icy Rain of Annihilation
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Ice DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: Heartless Annihilator Call
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons Lances of the Eternal Freeze.

SkillList.Name: Genesis Chord
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target, with a high chance of causing Imprisonment.

SkillList.Name: The Creation's Prelude
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Charging state. The next action uses "Last Choir of Genesis" on all targets.

SkillList.Name: Last Choir of Genesis
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: Harbinger of Annihilation
SkillList.SkillDesc: Locks Onto a single target. The next action uses "Soulrend Coldstream."

SkillList.Name: Creator's Resolve
SkillList.SkillDesc: After changing phases, slightly increases SPD and deals Imaginary DMG when attacking.

1005013.Name: Cocolia, Mother of Deception (Illusion)
1005013.Introduction: After being assimilated by the overflowing Fragmentum energy of the Stellaron, the Supreme Guardian transforms into a singer able to control Imaginary Energy and the mouthpiece of its promised "new world." This entity is a phantom borne from your memories.

SkillList.Name: Bone-Shattering Cold
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Ice DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Harbinger of Annihilation
SkillList.SkillDesc: Locks Onto a single target. In the next action, use "Soulrend Coldstream."

SkillList.Name: Soulrend Coldstream
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Ice DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Freeze the target. This ability will be additionally released on targets locked-on by Lance of the Eternal Freeze (Illusion).

SkillList.Name: Heartless Annihilator Call
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons Lances of the Eternal Freeze (Illusion).

SkillList.Name: Creator's Resolve
SkillList.SkillDesc: Converts to Imaginary-Type, increases SPD and DMG dealt, and removes the Toughness Protection state.

SkillList.Name: Genesis Chord
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Imprison the target. This ability will be additionally released on targets locked-on by Lance of the Eternal Freeze (Illusion).

SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Charging state. The next action uses "Last Choir of Genesis" on all targets.

SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: Blizzardous Crisis
SkillList.SkillDesc: This unit and all its summoned objects gain increased DMG for each Frozen or Imprisoned target on the opposing team.

1012010.Name: Automaton Hound
1012010.Introduction:
An automaton pieced together with Old World technology. It looks like a transportation vehicle whose purpose has long been forgotten.
In combat, Automaton Hounds can provide support and restore HP to its allies.

SkillList.Name: Vertical Strike
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Self-Healing Module
SkillList.SkillDesc: Immediately recovers all friendly units' HP.

1012011.Name: Automaton Hound
1012011.Introduction:
An automaton pieced together with Old World technology. It looks like a transportation vehicle whose purpose has long been forgotten.
In combat, Automaton Hounds can provide support and restore HP to its allies.

SkillList.Name: Vertical Strike
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Self-Healing Module
SkillList.SkillDesc: Immediately recovers all friendly units' HP.

1012020.Name: Automaton Spider
1012020.Introduction:
An automaton pieced together with Old World technology, tasked with replacing humans in performing the most basic forms of physical labor.
In combat, Automaton Spiders are highly unstable, capable of exploding when damaged.

SkillList.Name: Ram
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Timed Module
SkillList.SkillDesc: The next action uses Self-Exploding Module.

SkillList.Name: Self-Exploding Module
SkillList.SkillDesc: Self-destructs, dealing Fire DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

SkillList.Name: Chains of Destruction
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Fire DMG to adjacent units when suffering a killing blow.

1012021.Name: Automaton Spider
1012021.Introduction:
An automaton pieced together with Old World technology, tasked with replacing humans in performing the most basic forms of physical labor.
In combat, Automaton Spiders are highly unstable, capable of exploding when damaged.

SkillList.Name: Ram
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Timed Module
SkillList.SkillDesc: The next action uses Self-Exploding Module.

SkillList.Name: Self-Exploding Module
SkillList.SkillDesc: Self-destructs, dealing Fire DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

SkillList.Name: Chains of Destruction
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Fire DMG to adjacent units when suffering a killing blow.

1012030.Name: Automaton Beetle
1012030.Introduction:
An automaton pieced together with Old World technology. A signal light is placed on its legs, and the unit may have been used for mining or construction operations.
In combat, Automaton Beetles can create forcefields to shield themselves.

SkillList.Name: Unstable Forcefield
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target, and grants a Barrier to another friendly unit. The Barrier nullifies all DMG received except for DoT until after the friendly unit is attacked.

1012040.Name: Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit
1012040.Introduction:
A mechanical device controlled by Svarog.
When active on battlefield for certain turns, it will ruthlessly attack its enemies.

SkillList.Name: Oppressive Embrace
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Restrained targets Physical DMG equal to a percentage of their Max HP.

SkillList.Name: Oppressive Embrace
SkillList.SkillDesc: Restrains a single target, and deals Physical DMG 1 time. When this unit has their Weakness Broken, dispels the Restrain status from the target.

SkillList.Name: Disabling Field
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Restrained targets Physical DMG equal to a percentage of their Max HP.

SkillList.Name: Controlled Blasting
SkillList.SkillDesc: The Auxiliary Robot Arm explodes, dealing massive Physical DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Overload Warning
SkillList.SkillDesc: Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit enters Overload mode and immediately removes Restrain status from friendly units. When entering this mode, Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit will cast Controlled Blasting in its next action.

1012041.Name: Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit
1012041.Introduction:
A mechanical device controlled by Svarog.
When active on battlefield for certain turns, it will ruthlessly attack its enemies.

SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Restrained targets Physical DMG equal to a percentage of their Max HP.

SkillList.SkillDesc: Restrains a single target, and deals Physical DMG 1 time. When this unit has their Weakness Broken or drops below a certain amount of HP, dispels the Restrain status from the target.

SkillList.Name: Disabling Field
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG equal to a percentage of their Max HP to Restrained targets.

SkillList.Name: Controlled Blasting
SkillList.SkillDesc: The Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit explodes, dealing massive Physical DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Overload Warning
SkillList.SkillDesc: Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit enters Overload mode and immediately removes Restrain status from friendly units. When entering this mode, Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit will cast Controlled Blasting in its next action.

1012042.Name: Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit
1012042.Introduction:
A mechanical device controlled by Svarog.
After being active on the battlefield for a certain number of turns, this robot arm will ruthlessly attack its targets.

1013010.Name: Automaton Grizzly
1013010.Introduction:
An automaton pieced together with Old World technology. It has been reinforced with durable armor, so it can charge forward and protect the Silvermane Guards.
In combat, Automaton Grizzlys will summon Automaton Spiders and unleash a powerful charged attack.

SkillList.Name: Detonation Order
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons Automaton Spider.

SkillList.Name: Enrage Order
SkillList.SkillDesc: Has a chance to Taunt all targets.

SkillList.Name: Overcombust Order
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Charging state. The next action uses "Purge Order" on all targets.

SkillList.Name: Purge Order
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Massive Physical DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: Destruction Order
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

1013011.Introduction:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is an automaton pieced together with Old World technology. It's been reinforced with durable armor to charge forward and protect the Silvermane Guards.
In combat, Automaton Grizzlies (Bug) will send out a signal to summon Automaton Spiders and Beatles, and at the same time unleash powerful charged attacks.

SkillList.Name: Destruction Order

1013020.Name: Automaton Direwolf
1013020.Introduction:
An automaton pieced together with Old World technology. This rare type of humanoid automaton is equipped with a chainsaw on its right arm, presumably used for mining or construction operations.
In combat, Automaton Direwolfs will use their chainsaw to Bleed enemies, dealing DoT.

SkillList.Name: Felling Order
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Physical DMG to a single target, with a chance to Bleed the hit target. If the hit target is not Shielded, then a random ally of theirs suffers "Dismantle" for 1 time.

SkillList.Name: Lock On Target
SkillList.SkillDesc: Locks Onto a single target. The next action on the target will cast "Felling Order."

SkillList.Name: Disintegration Order
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict 1 stack of Bleed.

SkillList.Name: Dismantle
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict 1 stack of Bleed.

1013021.Name: Automaton Direwolf (Bug)
1013021.Introduction:

SkillList.Name: Targeting Order

1014010.Name: Svarog
1014010.Introduction:
An ancient relic from the Old World, that was originally used as an automated control unit by the Geomarrow Development Group. Unlike the vast majority of machines that lack intellect and can only act on command, Svarog is capable of much more complex thinking.
In battle, Svarog summons mechanical arms to grab and control his enemies, delivering devastating attacks.

SkillList.Name: Banishing Punch
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Burning Beam
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target and delays their action.

SkillList.Name: Oppressive Embrace
SkillList.SkillDesc: Restrains a single target, preventing them from taking action or being targeted. The Restraint is dispelled if the Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit suffers Weakness Break.

SkillList.Name: Shrewd Bombing
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Physical DMG to all targets, with a high chance to reduce their DEF.

SkillList.Name: Controlled Blasting
SkillList.SkillDesc: The Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit explodes, dealing massive Physical DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Overload Warning
SkillList.SkillDesc: Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit enters Overload Countdown, causing the next action to cast Controlled Blasting.

SkillList.Name: Boost Deployment
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit.

A complete projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is an ancient relic from the Old World, that was originally used as an automated control unit by the Geomarrow Development Group. Unlike the vast majority of machines that lack intellect and can only act on command, Svarog is capable of much more complex thinking.
In battle, Svarog (Complete) can summon various machines as well as a robot arm unit to grab and control enemies while unleashing devastating strikes.

SkillList.Name: Banishing Punch
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Burning Beam
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Physical DMG to a single target and delays their action.

SkillList.Name: Oppressive Embrace
SkillList.SkillDesc: Restrains a single target, preventing them from taking action or being targeted. The Restraint is dispelled if the Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit suffers Weakness Break.

SkillList.Name: Oversaturated Bombardment
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Physical DMG to all targets, with a high chance to reduce their DEF. This debuff can stack.

SkillList.Name: Controlled Blasting
SkillList.SkillDesc: The Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit explodes, dealing massive Physical DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Overload Warning
SkillList.SkillDesc: Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit enters Overload Countdown, causing the next action to cast Controlled Blasting.

SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit.

SkillList.SkillDesc: Increases the DMG dealt by all friendly units.

1022010.Name: Everwinter Shadewalker
1022010.Introduction:
Shades that wander in the Fragmentum after the arrival of the Eternal Freeze. It mimics the form of the Silvermane Guards in a twisted manner. Fitted with the same uniformed armors as the Belobog warriors, its skull is however replaced by an icicle of faceless ice.
Everwinter Shadewalkers will swing their ice ax and slow their enemies in battle.

SkillList.Name: Frost Crush
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Ice DMG to a single target and delays their action.

1022020.Name: Incineration Shadewalker
1022020.Introduction:
Shades that wander in the Fragmentum after the arrival of the Eternal Freeze. It mimics the form of the Silvermane Guards in a twisted manner. Fitted with the same uniformed armors as the Belobog warriors, its skull is however replaced by faceless embers.
Incineration Shadewalkers will swing their fiery ax and burn their enemies in battle.

SkillList.Name: Scorching Crush
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Fire DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Burn the target.

1023010.Name: Searing Prowler
1023010.Introduction:
A machine unit prowling in the Fragmentum. Undoubtedly, this monstrosity is not a human creation, but one that was born out of the perversion of the Fragmentum.
Searing Prowler's attacks will deal extra damage against enemies afflicted with Burn.

SkillList.Name: Crimson Blade
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Fire DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Burn the target.

SkillList.Name: Combustion Slash
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Fire DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target. This attack prioritizes targets afflicted with Burn.

SkillList.Name: Melt
SkillList.SkillDesc: After attacking a Burned target, receives a DMG increase.

SkillList.Name: High-Temperature Operation
SkillList.SkillDesc: Slightly increases ATK and greatly increases SPD. This buff is dispelled upon Weakness Break.

SkillList.Name: Dancing Cinders
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Fire DMG to all targets. Targets suffering from Burn are dealt an extra Fire DMG and have Burn removed.

1023011.Name: Searing Prowler (Bug)

SkillList.Name: Melt
SkillList.SkillDesc: After attacking a Burned target, receives a DMG increase.

1023020.Name: Frigid Prowler
1023020.Introduction:
A machine unit prowling in the Fragmentum. Undoubtedly, this monstrosity is not a human creation, but one that was born out of the perversion of the Fragmentum.
Frigid Prowlers will attract Everwinter Shadewalkers and reduce its enemy's SPD and Ice RES.

SkillList.Name: Summon Otherling

SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Ice DMG to all targets, with a high chance to Deep Freeze the targets.

SkillList.SkillDesc: Devours 1 Everwinter Shadewalker to increase ATK and Locks Onto a single target. If there are no Everwinter Shadewalkers on the field, DEF is decreased.

SkillList.Name: Blazing Freeze
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Ice DMG to all targets, with a high chance to Deep Freeze the targets.

1023022.Name: IPC Team Leader Illusion
1023022.Introduction: An Interastral Peace Corporation senior staff member with a minimal rank of project team leader. The mech they drive belongs to the IPC. If damaged, its repair fees have to be paid out-of-pocket. With a half-decent salary, they can at least afford to rent a one-bedroom apartment on one of the IPC's enterprise ships.

SkillList.Name: Devour Otherling
SkillList.SkillDesc: Devouring Everwinter Shadewalkers increases this unit's ATK and unleashes Blazing Freeze in the next action. The more Everwinter Shadewalkers devoured, the more times Blazing Freeze will be used in the next action. If there are no Everwinter Shadewalkers on the field, DEF is decreased.

2002010.Name: Cloud Knights Patroller
2002010.Introduction: Member of the ground patrol division of the Xianzhou Luofu Cloud Knights. Wearing a light set of silver armor and with a Devastator Glaive in hand, they are in charge of maintaining order in every delve.

SkillList.Name: Cloud Edge
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single target with a high chance to slightly increase the DMG taken by the target.

2002020.Name: Flying Sword
2002020.Introduction: Qi-controlled hovering attack unit, also named "Flying Sword." Closely connected to the wielder's psyche and can be used as an extension of its wielder's will.

SkillList.Name: Jadecarve Strike
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Ice DMG to a single target.

2002021.Name: Flying Sword

SkillList.Name: Jadecarve Strike
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Ice DMG to a single target.

2002030.Name: Wraith Warden
2002030.Introduction:
A somber warrior that accompanies the Judges of the Ten-Lords Commission to execute missions.
Adorned with the black and white mask that symbolizes the netherworld envoy, they wield a guillotine blade, their strikes echoing the weighty and unyielding duty of the Ten-Lords Commission.

SkillList.Name: Sawing Evil
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target and has a chance to inflict Reverberation to the target. After targets afflicted with Reverberation receive an attack, they enter Strong Reverberation and then have Reverberation dispelled. Targets with Strong Reverberation cannot take action.

2002031.Name: Wraith Warden
2002031.Introduction:

2004010.Name: Stellaron Hunter: Kafka
2004010.Introduction: One of the Stellaron Hunters. A beautiful assassin wearing an enigmatic smile, she excels in manipulation and various weaponry. It was by her design that the Astral Express was led here, all of which was simply part of a certain plan...

SkillList.Name: Midnight Tumult
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Shock the target.

SkillList.Name: Caressing Moonlight
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target. If the primary target is Shocked, inflicts Shock on the secondary units as well.

SkillList.Name: Silent and Sharp Mockery
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Lightning DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: Spirit Whisper
SkillList.SkillDesc: Has a high chance of Dominating a single target and Advancing their action forward to immediately attack a random ally of theirs.

SkillList.Name: Tremble
SkillList.SkillDesc: If the target is currently Shocked, directly causes Shock DMG 1 time.

SkillList.Name: Cruelty
SkillList.SkillDesc: When friendly units (apart from Kafka) or Dominated targets attack the Shocked primary target, unleash an extra Lightning attack. This can only be triggered 1 time per turn.

2005010.Name: Maddened Feixiao
2005010.Introduction:
The Merlin's Claw, who swallowed down the Crimson Moon to salvage the crisis and therefore descended into madness.
Possessed by the monster within born of yesteryear's unending battles, Feixiao turned into a tireless avatar of war. As her friend and present enemy, you understand that the only "antidote"... is to keep fighting.

SkillList.Name: Gunblade: Swordfang
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Wind DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Great Ax: Irontalon
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Wind DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict <u>Weaken</u>.

SkillList.Name: Heaven's Binds
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enhances self to gain additional action.

SkillList.Name: Wreathed in Storm
SkillList.SkillDesc: Resonates with all parts of the Ecliptic Inner Beast and dispels their Weakness Broken state. This unit cannot be attacked before its next action. In the next action, this unit will use Sweep the Heavens, Swallow the Earth on all targets.

SkillList.Name: Sweep the Heavens, Swallow the Earth
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Wind DMG to all targets and Enhances this unit based on the parts that have yet to be Weakness Broken. Every part that has yet to be Broken will increase the DMG dealt by this ability, and this ability will enhance the parts that are not Weakness Broken.

SkillList.Name: Passing Tempest
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Wind DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: Beastbond Strike
SkillList.SkillDesc: The additional action from Shadow of "Feixiao" will resonate with the Ecliptic Inner Beast's body parts. Resonance will restore a certain amount of Toughness for the Ecliptic Inner Beast's parts and increase the Toughness value reduced when attacked. The next action becomes Enhanced. Resonance with "Nebula Devourer" has a high chance of inflicting <u>Outrage</u> on all targets. Resonance with "Planeshred Claws" additionally greatly increases DMG. Resonance with "Worldpurge Tail" has a high chance of inflicting <u>Weaken</u> on all targets.

SkillList.Name: Safeguard
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Safeguard state. While not Weakness Broken, reduces DMG received. Once Weakness is Broken, action will be delayed. After Weakness is Broken, increases DMG received.

2011010.Name: Entranced Ingenium: Obedient Dracolion
2011010.Introduction: An ingenium casually made by craftsmasters of the Artisanship Commission. It was originally an inanimate alarm bell used for warnings, but now it has been given a short-lived "life" due to certain mutations.

SkillList.Name: Lion's Roar
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single target, with a chance to Weaken them.

2011020.Name: Entranced Ingenium: Golden Cloud Toad
2011020.Introduction: An ingenium casually made by craftsmasters of the Artisanship Commission. It was originally an inanimate burner used for purifying the air, but now it has been given a short-lived "life" due to certain mutations.

SkillList.Name: Dense Fog
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single target, with a chance to reduce the target's SPD.

2012010.Name: Entranced Ingenium: Illumination Dragonfish
2012010.Introduction: An ingenium casually made by craftsmasters of the Artisanship Commission. It was originally an inanimate illuminator used for casting light upon darkness, but now it has been given a short-lived "life" due to certain mutations.

SkillList.Name: Nightly Luminosity
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Fire DMG to all targets, with a high chance to reduce their DEF.

SkillList.Name: Candle Flame
SkillList.SkillDesc: When receiving a killing blow, deals Fire DMG to all friendly units, with a high chance to reduce their DEF.

2013010.Name: Aurumaton Gatekeeper
2013010.Introduction:
Garrison aurumaton created with ancient ingenium technology.
Countless years ago, the aurumatons set sail with the Xianzhou to seek divine recipes of immortality, and were tasked to oversee humanity and to aid humankind during warfare. However, after countless rebellions, they were finally overpowered by the Xianzhou natives.
Now, all aurumatons are strictly controlled with talismans, and are employed to guard important places.

SkillList.Name: Farewell Etiquette
SkillList.SkillDesc: The Sanction Rate level increases when your team uses Skills or Ultimates to attack. When the Sanction Rate reaches its level cap, enters Sanction mode and summons Entranced Ingenium: Illumination Dragonfish.

SkillList.Name: Dread
SkillList.SkillDesc: Increases Sanction Rate level and deals minor Imaginary DMG to all targets. Has a high chance to inflict Weaken on the targets.

SkillList.Name: Restraint
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Enchainment
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to a single target, with a high chance of inflicting Imprisonment.

2013011.Name: Aurumaton Gatekeeper (Bug)
2013011.Introduction:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is the garrison aurumatons created with ancient ingenium technology.
Countless years ago, the aurumatons set sail with the Xianzhou to seek divine recipes of immortality, and were tasked to oversee humanity and to aid humankind during warfare. However, after countless rebellions, they were finally overpowered by the Xianzhou natives.
Now, all aurumatons are strictly controlled with talismans, and are employed to guard important places.

2013020.Name: Aurumaton Spectral Envoy
2013020.Introduction:
A law-enforcing aurumaton engraved with the Ten-Lords Martial Scriptures and taking orders from the Ten-Lords Commission.
Living beings are susceptible to the corporeal and mental existence of the self, but gold and metal will never be swayed and will unwaveringly follow the Ten-Lords' edicts.
These aurumaton law enforcers use their strength to subdue evils that have strayed from the natural order of life, and bring them to the Netherworld to meet their sentence. Its authority is sometimes even greater than that of a judge.

SkillList.Name: Adjudicate
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Subdue
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target and has a high chance to inflict Reverberation on the target. After targets afflicted with Reverberation receive an attack, they enter the Strong Reverberation state and then have the Reverberation state dispelled. Targets with Strong Reverberation cannot take action.

SkillList.Name: Revert Yin and Yang
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to all targets and has a chance to inflict Reverberation.

SkillList.Name: Heaven's Fall
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Physical DMG to a single ally. If the target is afflicted with Strong Reverberation, they additionally take Physical DMG, and Strong Reverberation is then dispelled.

SkillList.Name: Soul Warrant
SkillList.SkillDesc: When there are targets afflicted with Strong Reverberation on the field, lock on to those targets and during the next action, use Heaven's Fall on them.

SkillList.Name: Heaven's Fall
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Physical DMG to a single ally. If the target is afflicted with Strong Reverberation, they additionally take Physical DMG, and Strong Reverberation is then dispelled.

2022010.Name: Mara-Struck Soldier
2022010.Introduction: Soldiers of the Xianzhou who somehow fell into madness. Their bodies continue to grow and mutate and have long lost their humanoid form. It is said that the long-lived Xianzhou natives would eventually be stricken with mara.

SkillList.Name: Callous Tailwind
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict Wind Shear.

SkillList.Name: Rejuvenate
SkillList.SkillDesc: Upon receiving a killing blow, restores a certain amount of HP. This effect does not have a time limit but can be dispelled. This effect can only trigger 1 time per battle.

SkillList.Name: Callous Tailwind
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict Wind Shear.

2022020.Name: Disciples of Sanctus Medicus: Internal Alchemist
2022020.Introduction:
A member of the Disciples of Sanctus Medicus, the secret sect that hid within the Xianzhou Luofu. 
With medicine, purify the heart. With elixir, transform one's body. They long to revive the ancient mysteries of Abundance, hoping to spur Xianzhou natives towards their next stage of evolution.

SkillList.Name: Seeding Core
SkillList.SkillDesc: Inflicts a single target with Spur of Thunderwoe.

SkillList.Name: Thundering Reign
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Core Rupture
SkillList.SkillDesc: Upon receiving a killing blow, this unit deals Lightning DMG to any targets that were inflicted with Spur of Thunderwoe by them. Afterward, Spur of Thunderwoe on these targets will be removed.

2022040.Name: Abundance Sprite: Golden Hound
2022040.Introduction:
A gilded hunting hound that moves with grace and speed.
When the Ambrosial Arbor still stood, the Xianzhou people bred many fantastic creatures with esoteric techniques. Golden Hounds were one of the war beasts that walked alongside the army.

SkillList.Name: Horn Gore
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Wind DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Rebound Roar
SkillList.SkillDesc: Upon receiving a killing blow, Advances Forward friendly units adjacent to self.

2022050.Name: Abundance Sprite: Wooden Lupus
2022050.Introduction:
A wolf surrounded with haze, its movement is elusive and unexpected.
When the Ambrosial Arbor still stood, the Xianzhou people bred many fantastic creatures with esoteric techniques. Wooden Lupuses were one of the war beasts that walked alongside the army.

SkillList.Name: Wolf Predation
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Shock the target.

SkillList.Name: Rallying Howl
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons 1 Shadow Jackhyena with the same Current HP as itself.

2022051.Name: Shadow Jackhyena
2022051.Introduction: Illusion formed by a Wooden Lupus.

SkillList.Name: Wolf Predation
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Shock the target.

2022060.Name: Disciples of Sanctus Medicus: Ballistarius
2022060.Introduction:
A member of the Disciples of Sanctus Medicus, the secret organization that had lain hidden in the Xianzhou Luofu.
They pursue cultivation using tools and merge with them. They long to revive the lost secrets of Abundance, hoping to spur Xianzhou natives toward their next stage of evolution.

SkillList.Name: Mounted Crossbow
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals successive Lightning DMG to random targets.

2022070.Name: Twig of Wintry Wind
2022070.Introduction: A branch of Ambrosial Arbor created from the Ebon Deer's footprint

SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Wind DMG to one target with a high chance of inflicting "Outrage." Targets afflicted by "Outrage" cannot take action for a number of turns and will attack a random unit friendly to this unit.

2022071.Introduction: A branch of Ambrosial Arbor created from the Ebon Deer's footprint

2022080.Name: Twig of Marple Leaf
2022080.Introduction: A branch of Ambrosial Arbor created from the Ebon Deer's footprint

2022110.Name: Mara-Struck Warden
2022110.Introduction:
A Ten-Lords Commission soldier that has fallen to mara.
As long as they are still mortals of flesh and blood, the people of Xianzhou will never be able to escape their fate.

SkillList.Name: Sawing Evil: Chop
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Sawing Evil: Sever
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Wind DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Maddened
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Maddened state at the start of battle. While in the Maddened state, uses Sawing Evil: Sever.

2023010.Name: Disciples of Sanctus Medicus: Shape Shifter
2023010.Introduction:
A cultivator who longs to revive the ancient mysteries of Abundance, and to guide the Xianzhou natives back on the liberating path of immortality.
Now, their wish has been fulfilled. Gifted by the power of the ancient miracle and using it as both weapon and armor, they managed to touch on the secret of immortality.

SkillList.Name: Thunder-Shock
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Punishing Bolts

SkillList.Name: Thudding Calamity

SkillList.Name: Wrathful Roar
SkillList.SkillDesc: Gains 3 stacks of Gusto and marks a random target for Monitoring. Until Gusto is exhausted, any target that uses their Skill will become the new Monitored target.

2023021.Name: Abundance Sprite: Malefic Ape (Bug)
2023021.Introduction:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is an ape as tall as mountainous boulders with terrifying might.
When the Ambrosial Arbor still stood, the Xianzhou people bred many fantastic creatures with their esoteric techniques. Malefic Apes were one of the war beasts that walked alongside the army.

SkillList.Name: Simian Strike
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Quantum DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Wrathful Roar
SkillList.SkillDesc: Locks onto a random target. Whenever any target uses their Skill, they will become the new lock-on target, and this unit gains 1 stack of Gusto. The next time this unit uses Simian Strike, consume all current Gusto stacks and increase this unit's ATK based on the number of stacks consumed. Accumulated Gusto stacks will be cleared when this unit has its Weakness Broken.

SkillList.Name: Simian Howl
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Quantum DMG to all targets.

2023030.Name: The Ascended
2023030.Introduction:
The form that the Disciples of Sanctus Medicus crave. A true appearance that cast off the burdens of humanity and has been reforged using the way of immortality.
In ancient times, those who sought immortality received wisdom from the Ambrosial Arbor and called themselves Celestials. They lived without restraints and molded the flesh of themselves and others at will. They have long forgotten their original appearances after countless metamorphoses.

SkillList.Name: Rite of Great Arbor Metamorphosis
SkillList.SkillDesc: Continuously deal Wind DMG to a random target, with a high chance to cause Wind Shear.

SkillList.Name: Guiding Vulturnus
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Wind DMG to the targeted and adjacent allies, with a high chance to cause Wind Shear.

SkillList.Name: Arboreal Thorns
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Wind DMG to a single target, with a high chance to cause Wind Shear.

SkillList.Name: Rite of Subduing Prana
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters Japa. Cast "Black Prana's Snare" on all targets during the next action.

SkillList.Name: Black Prana's Snare
SkillList.SkillDesc: Has a high chance for all targets to become afflicted with Prana-Siphon.

2023031.Name: The Ascended (Bug)
2023031.Introduction:

In ancient times, those who sought immortality received wisdom from the Ambrosial Arbor and called themselves Celestials. They lived without restraints, and molded the flesh of themselves and others at will. They have long forgotten their original appearances after countless metamorphoses.

SkillList.Name: Arboreal Thorns
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Wind DMG to a single target, with a high chance to cause Wind Shear.

SkillList.Name: Black Prana's Snare
SkillList.SkillDesc: Has a high chance for all targets to become afflicted with Prana-Siphon.

SkillList.Name: Vitals Drained
SkillList.SkillDesc: When attacking targets in the Prana-Siphon state, the DMG dealt by this attack will be converted to the extent of Max HP reduced by Prana-Siphon, and refresh Prana-Siphon's duration. Prana-Siphon can reduce Maximum Restorable HP by up to <unbreak>50%</unbreak>.

2024010.Name: Abundant Ebon Deer
2024010.Introduction:
An auspicious spiritual beast wrought into being by the Ambrosial Arbor and protects its roots. Its arrival brings along exuberant vegetation and promises good fortune.
Once destroyed during ancient wars, the Ambrosial Arbor is mended by the Stellaron and finally revives. Rare creatures and legendary beasts made by celestials of the past all return to this world, like an old dream coming alive again.

SkillList.Name: Pedicel: Wintry Wind
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons Ambrosial Arbor branch "Twig of Wintry Wind"

SkillList.Name: Pedicel: Marple Leaf
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons Ambrosial Arbor branch "Twig of Marple Leaf"

SkillList.Name: Pedicel: Glorious Blooms

SkillList.Name: Pedicel: Lavish Fruits

SkillList.Name: Wavering Bleat
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Caress of Wind
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Wind DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: Hardy Leaf Sheath
SkillList.SkillDesc: Increases DEF. Toughness cannot be reduced.

SkillList.Name: Flamboyant Gore
SkillList.SkillDesc: Uses this ability immediately when there are 2 Lavish Fruits on the field. Deals Lightning DMG to all targets. Deals more damage for every "Ambrosial Arbor Branches" on the field. After the ability is used, remove all "Ambrosial Arbor Branches" on the field.

SkillList.Name: Back to Life
SkillList.SkillDesc: Absorbs Ambrosial Arbor energy and restores all HP.

At the end of this stalking pursuit, the surviving party would obtain the right to walk the world as the Merlin's Claw.

SkillList.SkillDesc: Nebula Devourer, Planeshred Claws, and Worldpurge Tail share their HP with the Shadow of "Feixiao."

2033021.Name: Ecliptic Inner Beast & Shadow of "Feixiao"
2033021.Introduction:
Provoking the temptations within, usurping the powerful spirit, transforming in appearance... The abomination lurking inside Feixiao has begun its hunt for her.
At the end of this stalking pursuit, the surviving party would obtain the right to walk the world as the Merlin's Claw.

SkillList.Name: Seance
SkillList.SkillDesc: Nebula Devourer, Planeshred Claws, and Worldpurge Tail share their HP with the Shadow of "Feixiao."

2034010.Name: Borisin Warhead: Hoolay
2034010.Introduction:
A borisin leader who committed the Ten Unpardonable Sins, eternally imprisoned at the bottom of The Shackling Prison.
Bearing the hatred of seven centuries of bitter confinement, the Lord of Wolves challenges the entire Xianzhou Luofu upon breaking free from his cage. Yet, there seems to be another objective hidden behind his maddened actions...

SkillList.Name: Broken Blades as Fang
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Severed Iron as Claws
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target and adjacent units.

SkillList.Name: Barrenness of Earth Gouged
SkillList.SkillDesc: Causes all targets (except this unit) to have their action delayed and deals minor Lightning DMG.

SkillList.Name: Decimation of Roaring Storms
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Lightning DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: Lupine Chase Calls Bloody Gleam
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Lightning DMG to a designated single target, with a high chance of inflicting <u>Terror Grip</u>.

SkillList.Name: Warhead Moon Rage
SkillList.SkillDesc: After a friendly unit launches an attack, apply 1 stack of <u>Bloodlust</u> to <u>friendly units who can enter the Moon Rage state</u>. When <u>Bloodlust</u> reaches a certain number of stacks, the friendly unit enters the <u>Moon Rage</u> state.\nA Moon Rage countdown icon appears on the Action Order. When the countdown's turn begins, <u>Moon Rage</u> is dispelled across all friendly units.

SkillList.Name: Moonhowl Lupus
SkillList.SkillDesc: While Hoolay is in the <u>Moon Rage</u> state, applies 1 stack of Irate to Hoolay after every attack launched by friendly units. If Hoolay uses an attack, additionally applies 1 stack of Irate. After every attack used by target units, reduce 1 stack of Irate. Irate will have an initial set of stacks. When a certain number of Irate stacks is reached, Hoolay will release Lupine Chase Calls Bloody Gleam and remove all Irate stacks. Whenever Irate stacks are reduced to 0 due to attacks from player characters, Hoolay's Toughness will be reduced and reset Irate to a set number of stacks.

SkillList.Name: To My Howls the Pack Obeys
SkillList.SkillDesc: Adds Summon the Pack to the Action Order. Whenever Summon the Pack takes action, summons Sableclaw Wolftrooper or Eclipse Wolftrooper. When any enemy enters the <u>Moon Rage</u> state, Summon the Pack's action is delayed.

2035010.Name: Shadow of "Feixiao"
2035010.Introduction: Hoolay, who used the Crimson Moon to escape death, has manifested in the form of Feixiao, standing opposite her, as if in a mirror.

SkillList.Name: Gunblade: Swordfang
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Wind DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Great Ax: Irontalon
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Wind DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict <u>Weaken</u>.

SkillList.Name: Heaven's Binds
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enhances self to gain additional action.

SkillList.Name: Wreathed in Storm
SkillList.SkillDesc: Resonates with all parts of the Ecliptic Inner Beast and dispels their Weakness Broken state. This unit cannot be attacked before its next action. In the next action, this unit will use Sweep the Heavens, Swallow the Earth on all targets.

SkillList.Name: Sweep the Heavens, Swallow the Earth
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Wind DMG to all targets and Enhances this unit based on the parts that have yet to be Weakness Broken. Every part that has yet to be Broken will increase the DMG dealt by this ability, and this ability will enhance the parts that are not Weakness Broken.

SkillList.Name: Passing Tempest
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Wind DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: Beastbond Strike
SkillList.SkillDesc: The additional action from Shadow of "Feixiao" will resonate with the Ecliptic Inner Beast's body parts. Resonance will restore a certain amount of Toughness for the Ecliptic Inner Beast's parts and increase the Toughness value reduced when attacked. The next action becomes Enhanced. Resonance with "Nebula Devourer" has a high chance of inflicting <u>Outrage</u> on all targets. Resonance with "Planeshred Claws" additionally greatly increases DMG. Resonance with "Worldpurge Tail" has a high chance of inflicting <u>Weaken</u> on all targets.

SkillList.Name: Safeguard
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Safeguard state. While not Weakness Broken, reduces DMG received. Once Weakness is Broken, action will be delayed. After Weakness is Broken, increases DMG received.

3001010.Name: Dreamjolt Troupe's Spring Loader
3001010.Introduction:
Penacony's service machinery that got out of control due to the emotional interference in the Dreamscape.
Originally a tool for entertainment on the card table, it is still shaking the dice in its hands after losing control, continuing the game in a crude manner.

SkillList.Name: Throw Die
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target, with a chance to reduce the target's Effect RES.

3001020.Name: Dreamjolt Troupe's Birdskull
3001020.Introduction:
Penacony's service machinery that got out of control due to the emotional interference in the Dreamscape.
Originally a prop in the theater, it is still performing the farce on the stage after losing control, bringing cacophonic dance steps to every direction.

SkillList.Name: Dance Invite
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target, with a chance to inflict Bleed on them.

3002010.Name: Dreamjolt Troupe's Mr. Domescreen
3002010.Introduction:
Penacony's service machinery that got out of control due to the emotional interference in the Dreamscape.
Originally an entertainer in TV shows, it is still portraying its ever-changing roles after losing control and continues to bring surprises or scares to the audience.

SkillList.Name: Surprise Variety Show
SkillList.SkillDesc: Regenerates Energy for a target. This ability can only be used while under the Surprise Channel state.

SkillList.Name: Startling Broadcast
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Quantum DMG to all targets and causes all targets' Energy to be reduced. This ability can only be used while in the Fright Channel state.

SkillList.Name: Channel Switch
SkillList.SkillDesc: Switches the Surprise Channel status to the Fright Channel status.

SkillList.Name: Channel Crossover
SkillList.SkillDesc: After being attacked, this unit will switch from the Surprise Channel status to the Fright Channel status, or vice versa.

3002011.Name: Banacademic Office's Assistanana
3002011.Introduction: Originally a Mr. Domescreen loaded with the general syllabus. The educational materials became banaducational materials due to the influence of the memetic virus. It shifts between banarocky seriousness and sunny banapassion. An indisposable banamployee and a monkey who's a worthy banafriend.

SkillList.Name: Banappiness Holiday
SkillList.SkillDesc: Regenerates Energy for one designated target. This ability can only be used while under the "Off-Class Channel" state.

SkillList.Name: Banascary Semester
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Quantum DMG to all targets and causes all targets' Energy to be reduced. This ability can only be used while in the "Classroom Channel" state.

3002020.Introduction:
Penacony's service machinery that got out of control due to the emotional interference in the Dreamscape.
Originally a prize-drawing robot made to bring surprise to guests, it still bears all kinds of gifts even after losing control, and longs to prove the good luck of the guest by sacrificing itself.

SkillList.Name: Lottery Warmup

SkillList.Name: Dreamjolt Prizepool
SkillList.SkillDesc: When receiving a killing blow from the designated attack type, triggers different effects based on the attack type. When simultaneously receiving attacks of multiple types, the effects will be triggered in the following order of priority: Lost the <unbreak>50</unbreak>/<unbreak>50</unbreak>!, Hit the Guarantee!, and Jackpot!

SkillList.Name: Lost the <unbreak>50</unbreak>/<unbreak>50</unbreak>!
SkillList.SkillDesc: After suffering a killing blow from a Basic ATK or DoT, recovers Skill Points for targets.

SkillList.Name: Hit the Guarantee!
SkillList.SkillDesc: After suffering a killing blow from a Skill, Memosprite Skill, or a Follow-up ATK, regenerates Energy for all targets.

SkillList.Name: Jackpot!
SkillList.SkillDesc: After suffering a killing blow from an Ultimate, regenerates Energy and Skill Points for all targets.

3002021.Name: Banacademic Office's Fortune BananAdvisor
3002021.Introduction: Originally a Fortune Seller loaded with the Fortune Academy syllabus. The educational materials became banaducational materials due to the influence of the memetic virus. A brain as cunning as bananas is the best weapon in the market, and the banaxchanges full of unpredictable outcomes are banastressing out the monkeys.

SkillList.Name: Bad Monkeys Get Demerits

Originally a delivery robot of SoulGlad, it is still dispensing sweetness after losing control, inviting everyone to taste this delicacy.

SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

3002050.Name: Lordly Trashcan
3002050.Introduction: A peculiar entity born within the realm of fiction, its story documented in the nameless chronicles: A lone and valiant trashcan bearing the mission of the Garbage King to seek formidable warriors to eliminate all waste that threatens the world.

SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: The Can's Tribulations
SkillList.SkillDesc: Increases this unit's ATK. This effect is stackable and unremovable.

SkillList.Name: The Can's Creed
SkillList.SkillDesc: When this unit is Weakness Broken, it will leave the battle. When attacked, Weaknesses corresponding to the attack's Type will be implanted, up to 2 Weaknesses.

3002052.Introduction: A peculiar entity born within the realm of fiction, its story documented in the nameless chronicles: A lone and valiant trashcan bearing the mission of the Garbage King to seek formidable warriors to eliminate all waste that threatens the world.

SkillList.Name: The Can's Trials
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: The Can's Tribulations
SkillList.SkillDesc: Increases this unit's ATK. This effect is stackable and unremovable.

SkillList.Name: The Can's Creed
SkillList.SkillDesc: When this unit is Weakness Broken, it will leave the battle. When attacked, Weaknesses corresponding to the attack's Type will be implanted, up to 2 Weaknesses.

3002053.Name: Lordly Trashcan (Projection)
3002053.Introduction: A peculiar entity born within the realm of fiction, its story documented in the nameless chronicles: A lone and valiant trashcan bearing the mission of the Garbage King to seek formidable warriors to eliminate all waste that threatens the world.

SkillList.Name: The Can's Trials
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: The Can's Tribulations
SkillList.SkillDesc: Increases this unit's ATK. This effect is stackable and unremovable.

SkillList.Name: The Can's Creed
SkillList.SkillDesc: When this unit's Weakness is Broken, Weakness will be Broken for all friendly units except Lordly Trashcan (Projection). At the same time, this unit will exit the battle. When attacked, Weaknesses corresponding to the attack's Type will be implanted.

3003010.Name: Dreamjolt Troupe's Beyond Overcooked
3003010.Introduction:
Penacony's service machinery that got out of control due to the emotional interference in the Dreamscape.
Originally a culinary robot, it is still breathing fire for grilling ingredients after losing control, intending to burn the diners to crisps.

SkillList.Name: Ladle Swirl
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Fire DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Tornado Toss
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single target and adjacent targets.

SkillList.Name: Ignite Stove
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Charging state. In the next action, uses Flaming Stir-Fry if Stove Heating has not reached a certain number of stacks, then clears all Stove Heating stacks.

SkillList.Name: Flaming Stir-Fry
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Fire DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: Kitchen Mishap
SkillList.SkillDesc: After entering the Charging state, deals massive Fire DMG to all friendly units and decreases this unit's DEF once Stove Heating has a certain number of stacks. Then, clears all Stove Heating stacks.

SkillList.Name: Flame-Forged Feast
SkillList.SkillDesc: While not under the Charging state, upon reaching a certain number of Stove Heating stacks, immediately takes action and uses Ignite Stove.

SkillList.Name: Inferno Stove
SkillList.SkillDesc: When attacking, this unit has a chance to Slow the target. When this unit is attacked or takes DoT, gains 1 stack of Stove Heating.

3003011.Name: Dreamjolt Troupe's Beyond Overcooked (Projection)

SkillList.Name: Flame-Forged Feast
SkillList.SkillDesc: While not under the Charging state, upon reaching a certain number of Stove Heating stacks, immediately takes action and uses Stove Detonation.

SkillList.Name: Inferno Stove
SkillList.SkillDesc: When attacking, this unit has a high chance to Slow the target. When this unit is attacked or takes DoT, gains 1 stack of Stove Heating.

3003013.Name: Banacademic Office's Charmony BananAdvisor
3003013.Introduction: Originally a Beyond Overcooked loaded with the Charmony Academy syllabus. The educational materials became banaducational materials due to the influence of the memetic virus. The banaxious heart on stage brews a banaphony of flames, vowing to barbeque bad banastudents who don't listen to banadvice to charbanas.

SkillList.Name: Physical Banashment! Take This!
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Fire DMG to one target and their adjacent targets, with a high chance of inflicting "Burn." This ability can only be used while in the "Classroom Channel" state.

SkillList.Name: Collective Banashment! Take This!
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Fire DMG to all targets, with a high chance of inflicting "Burn" on all targets. This ability can only be used while in the "Classroom Channel" state.

SkillList.Name: Monkey No! Emergency Tutoring!
SkillList.SkillDesc: Makes one random friendly unit and this unit switch to the "Classroom Channel" state and applies "<u>Tutoring</u>" to them. This can only be used in the "Off-Class Channel" state.

SkillList.Name: Monkey Yes! Holiday Activities!
SkillList.SkillDesc: Increases all targets' ATK. This ability can only be used while under the "Off-Class Channel" state.

SkillList.Name: Disrupt Banasyllabus
SkillList.SkillDesc: After being attacked, switches the "Classroom Channel" state to the "Off-Class Channel" state. When in "Off-Class Channel" state, will not switch channels after being attacked.

SkillList.Name: Teach Monkeys a Banalesson
SkillList.SkillDesc: When attacking, this unit has a chance to apply the Slow state on the target.

3003015.Name: Banacademic Office's Charmony BananAdvisor
3003015.Introduction: Originally a Beyond Overcooked loaded with the Charmony Academy syllabus. The educational materials became banaducational materials due to the influence of the memetic virus. The banaxious heart on stage brews a banaphony of flames, vowing to barbeque bad banastudents who don't listen to banadvice to charbanas.

SkillList.Name: Physical Banashment! Take This!
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Fire DMG to one ally unit and adjacent targets, with a high chance of inflicting "Burn." This ability can only be used while in the "Classroom Channel" state.

SkillList.Name: Collective Banashment! Take This!
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Fire DMG to all target units, with a high chance of inflicting "Burn." This ability can only be used while in the "Classroom Channel" state.

SkillList.Name: No-Banana! Surprise Exam!
SkillList.SkillDesc: Switches the "Off-Class Channel" state to the "Classroom Channel" state.

SkillList.Name: Monkeys, Take a Break!
SkillList.SkillDesc: When switching the state from "Classroom Channel" to "Off-Class Channel," increases all targets' ATK.

SkillList.Name: Banacademic Incident
SkillList.SkillDesc: After being attacked for a number of times, switches the "Classroom Channel" state to the "Off-Class Channel" state and enters the Weakness Broken state.

SkillList.Name: Teach Monkeys a Banalesson
SkillList.SkillDesc: When attacking, this unit has a chance to Slow the target.

3003020.Name: Dreamjolt Troupe's Sweet Gorilla
3003020.Introduction:
Penacony's service machinery that got out of control due to the emotional interference in the Dreamscape.
Originally a transport robot of SoulGlad, it is still carrying the burden of the delicacy after losing control while launching its gift to guests passing by.

SkillList.Name: Limited Free Drinks
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Ice DMG to a single target. If the target has Shield, additionally deal Ice DMG to this unit with a high chance to decrease this unit's DEF.

SkillList.Name: Unlimited Free Drinks
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals 4 hits of Ice DMG to one random target. If the target has Shield, additionally deal Ice DMG to self with a high chance to decrease this unit's DEF.

SkillList.Name: SoulGlad Party
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons 2 Bubble Hounds.

SkillList.Name: Celebration Fountain
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Charging stage and gains Toughness Protection. Uses Unlimited Free Drinks during the next action.

3003021.Name: Dreamjolt Troupe's Sweet Gorilla (Projection)
3003021.Introduction:
Penacony's service machinery that got out of control due to the emotional interference in the Dreamscape.
Originally a transport robot of SoulGlad, it is still carrying the burden of the delicacy after losing control while launching its gift to guests passing by.

SkillList.Name: Limited Free Drinks
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Ice DMG to a single target and Advances the target's action Forward. If the target has Shield, additionally deal Ice DMG to this unit with a high chance to decrease this unit's DEF.

SkillList.Name: Unlimited Free Drinks
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals 4 hits of Ice DMG to one Monitored target and Advances the target's action Forward. If the target has Shield, additionally deal Ice DMG to a random friendly unit with a high chance to decrease the affected unit's DEF.

SkillList.Name: SoulGlad Party
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons 2 Bubble Hounds.

SkillList.Name: Celebration Fountain
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Charging state and gains Toughness Protection. When taking action the next time, uses Unlimited Free Drinks. At the same time, marks a random target for Monitoring. Any target that uses their Skill will become the new Monitored target. While in this state, this unit's action will be Advanced Forward when attacked.

3003022.Name: Dreamjolt Troupe's Sweet Gorilla (Bug)
3003022.Introduction:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is one Penacony's service machinery that got out of control due to the emotional interference in the Dreamscape.
Originally a transport robot of SoulGlad, it is still carrying the burden of the delicacy after losing control while launching its gift to guests passing by.

SkillList.Name: Limitless Free Drinks
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Ice DMG to a single target. When hitting targets without a Shield, there is a small chance of Freezing the attacked target. If the target has a Shield, additionally deals Ice DMG to this unit with a high chance to decrease this unit's DEF.

SkillList.Name: Frenzied Free Drinks
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Ice DMG to a random single target for 4 times. When each hit lands on a target that has no Shield, there is a high chance of Freezing the target. If the target has a Shield, then after dealing DMG, this attacking unit also deals Ice DMG on itself, with a high chance to decrease its own DEF.

SkillList.Name: SoulGlad Party
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons 2 Bubble Hounds.

SkillList.Name: Celebration Fountain
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Charging state and gains Toughness Protection. Uses Frenzied Free Drinks during the next action.

3003030.Name: "Past Confined and Caged"
3003030.Introduction: An artist playing the role of the prisoner in the Sweet Dreams Troupe. It should be performing in the Charmony Festival, but it is now bound by Order and keeps performing scenes of the "Past." The past is an immortal chain, its tranquil flame igniting within a cage, beckoning the jailer's authority with mere candlelight.

SkillList.Name: Cleansing Flagellation
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Admonishment of the Masses
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

SkillList.Name: Shackle-Bearing Messenger
SkillList.SkillDesc: Locks onto one target and enters the Charging state. In the next action, uses "Desmios Evangelion." During the Charging state, if this unit is attacked by another target, it will also lock onto the attacking target. Delays the unit's action when they are Weakness Broken during the Charging state.

SkillList.Name: Desmios Evangelion
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Physical DMG to one designated locked-on target, the DMG is <u>evenly distributed</u> across all targets.

3003040.Introduction: A musician responsible for playing the harmonious tune in the Sweet Dreams Troupe. It should be playing in the Charmony Festival, but it is now bound by Order and keeps performing scenes of the "Future." The future is an eternal ballad, a vision of happiness strung together, calling to the composing sovereign with the melody of a harp.

3003050.Name: "Present Inebriated in Revelry"
3003050.Introduction: A waiter responsible for entertaining the guests in the Sweet Dreams Troupe. It should be serving in the Charmony Festival, but it is now bound by Order and keeps performing scenes of the "Present." The present is a feast lasting through the night, desire for joy rippling in each cup, offering fine brews to the host who sets the banquet.

SkillList.Name: Precious Blood Shed For You
SkillList.SkillDesc: High chance of inflicting <u>Carousal of Wantonness</u> or <u>Carousal of Revelry</u> to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Feast That Is Set For You
SkillList.SkillDesc: High chance of inflicting <u>Carousal of Wantonness</u> or <u>Carousal of Revelry</u> to all targets.

SkillList.Name: A Cup Runneth Over For You
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Charging state, with a high chance of inflicting <u>Carousal of Wantonness</u> or <u>Carousal of Revelry</u> to all targets. In the next Action, uses "Wash Away All Sins For You".

SkillList.Name: Wash Away All Sins For You
SkillList.SkillDesc: Immediately causes all DoT effects currently active on all targets to deal damage 1 time and dispels all DoT effects on all targets.

3004010.Name: The Past, Present, and Eternal Show
3004010.Introduction: The actors of the Sweet Dreams Troupe have accepted the grace of the Order and become puppets that declare the law. They dance under the supreme commandments, beginning a show that will welcome the coming of paradise.

SkillList.Name: Hearing, Together As One
SkillList.SkillDesc: In this battle, "The Past, Present, and Eternal Show" shares HP with all "Puppets of the Order"

SkillList.Name: Appeal, Singular Grace
SkillList.SkillDesc: When entering battle, chooses a Puppet of the Order to become Impresario, granting them an extra action each turn and a small increase to their SPD. When that friendly unit's Weakness is Broken, causes their action to be delayed and re-selects another Puppet of the Order to become Impresario. If all Puppets of the Order are Weakness Broken at this time, this unit will receive DMG and delay all Puppets of the Order's actions while also increasing the DMG they receive. When any Puppet of the Order recovers from being Weakness Broken, they will be designated as the new Impresario.

SkillList.Name: Decree, Unified with Divine
SkillList.SkillDesc: Causes all Puppets of the Order to become Impresario, granting them an extra action each turn and a small increase to their SPD. When the target's Weakness is Broken, causes their action to be delayed. If all Puppets of the Order are Weakness Broken at this time, this unit will receive DMG and delay all Puppets of the Order's actions while also increasing the DMG they receive. When a Puppets of the Order recovers from being Weakness Broken, they will be designated as the new Impresario.

SkillList.Name: Enact, Heed Thy Command
SkillList.SkillDesc: Adds Commandment to the Action Order. Every time Commandment acts, dispels all Crowd Control debuffs and Weakness Broken states afflicting the Puppets of the Order on the field and unleashes "Dance for Synchrony." Whenever a Puppet of the Order is Weakness Broken, Commandment will suffer a slight action delay.

SkillList.Name: Dance for Synchrony
SkillList.SkillDesc: There is a high chance of inflicting <u>Carousal of Wantonness</u> or <u>Carousal of Revelry</u> on all targets. There is a high chance of inflicting the <u>Alien Dream</u> state on all targets, dealing massive Physical DMG.

3004011.Name: The Past, Present, and Eternal Show (Complete)
3004011.Introduction: A complete projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is the actors of the Sweet Dreams Troupe who have accepted the grace of the Order and become puppets that declare the law. They dance under the supreme commandments, beginning a show that will welcome the coming of paradise.

SkillList.Name: Hearing, Together As One
SkillList.SkillDesc: In this battle, "The Past, Present, and Eternal Show" shares HP with all "Puppets of the Order."

SkillList.Name: Appeal, Singular Grace
SkillList.SkillDesc: When entering battle, chooses a Puppet of the Order to become Impresario, granting them an extra action each turn and a small increase to their SPD. When that friendly unit's Weakness is Broken, causes their action to be delayed and re-selects another Puppet of the Order to become Impresario. If all Puppets of the Order are Weakness Broken at this time, this unit will receive DMG and delay all Puppets of the Order's actions while also increasing the DMG they receive. When any Puppet of the Order recovers from being Weakness Broken, they will be designated as the new Impresario.

SkillList.Name: Decree, Unified with Divine
SkillList.SkillDesc: Causes all Puppets of the Order to become Impresario and enter the Safeguard state, granting them an extra action each turn and a small increase to their SPD. When the target's Weakness is Broken, causes their action to be delayed. If all Puppets of the Order are Weakness Broken at this time, this unit will receive DMG and delay all Puppets of the Order's actions while also increasing the DMG they receive. When a Puppet of the Order recovers from being Weakness Broken, they will be designated as the new Impresario.

Whenever a Puppet of the Order is Weakness Broken, Commandment will suffer a slight action delay.

SkillList.Name: Verdict, Eternal Life
SkillList.SkillDesc: Adds Commandment to the Action Order once.

SkillList.Name: Dance for Synchrony
SkillList.SkillDesc: There is a high chance of inflicting <u>Carousal of Wantonness</u> or <u>Carousal of Revelry</u> on all targets. There is a high chance of inflicting the <u>Alien Dream</u> state on all targets, dealing massive Physical DMG.

3004020.Name: Wonder Forest's Banacademic Office Staff
3004020.Introduction: Sweet Dreams Troupe with their reason clouded by the shade of the AtaviSearch Forest. They carry with them the memetic virus borne into fruit in the Wonder Forest, banaoldly promoting the banacreed of the Slumbernana Monkey and Dr. Primitive's banadvice.

SkillList.Name: Pride of the Monkey Pack
SkillList.SkillDesc: In this battle, Wonder Forest's Banacademic Office Staff shares HP with all Banacademic Office members.

SkillList.Name: Banacademic Curriculum
SkillList.SkillDesc: Adds "End-of-Semester Dinner" on the Action Order. Every time "End-of-Semester Dinner" takes action, dispels all Crowd Control debuffs and Weakness Broken states on all Banacademic Office members on the field, switches all "Off-Class Channel" states on all Banacademic Office members on the field to "Classroom Channel" states, and uses "To the Doctor: Banacademic Report." Every time a Banacademic Office member's Weakness is Broken, the action of "End-of-Semester Dinner" is slightly delayed.

SkillList.Name: To the Doctor: Banacademic Report
SkillList.SkillDesc: Increases all friendly units' ATK. Reduces all target units' Energy and Skill Points and deals Quantum and Fire DMG to all target units, with a chance to apply Slow and a high chance to inflict "Burn."

3004021.Name: Blaznana Monkey Trick
3004021.Introduction: Sweet Dreams Troupe with their reason clouded by the shade of the AtaviSearch Forest. They carry with them the memetic virus borne into fruit in the Wonder Forest, banaoldly promoting the banacreed of the Slumbernana Monkey and Dr. Primitive's banadvice.

SkillList.Name: Pride of the Monkey Pack
SkillList.SkillDesc: In this battle, Blaznana Monkey Trick shares HP with all Banacademic Office members.

SkillList.Name: Banacademic Curriculum
SkillList.SkillDesc: Adds "End-of-Semester Dinner" on the Action Order. Every time "End-of-Semester Dinner" takes action, dispels all Crowd Control debuffs and Weakness Broken states on all "Banacademic Office" members on the field, switches the "Off-Class Channel" state on all "Banacademic Office" members to "Classroom Channel" states, and uses "To the Doctor: Banacademic Report."

SkillList.Name: To the Doctor: Banacademic Report
SkillList.SkillDesc: Increases all friendly units' ATK. Reduces all target units' Energy and Skill Points and deals Quantum and Fire DMG to all target units, with a chance to apply Slow and a high chance to inflict "Burn."

SkillList.Name: Regular Examination
SkillList.SkillDesc: When enemy units in the "Classroom Channel" state are switched to "Off-Class Channel" via either Breaking their Weaknesses or accumulating the tally, reduces the Toughness of "Blaznana Monkey Trick". When all enemy units are Weakness Broken, attacking any enemy units can reduce the Toughness of "Blaznana Monkey Trick" by a minor amount. When "Blaznana Monkey Trick" is Weakness Broken, all enemy targets will be Broken, and the "Blaznana Monkey Trick" will enter the "Safeguard Breach" state.

3011010.Name: Memory Zone Meme "Allseer"
3011010.Introduction:
An entity infused with a certain cognition, constructed from fragments of subconsciousness in the Memory Zone.
Observation, retrospection, inspection... In the pursuit of preservation and existential understanding of the self, the memories of "seeing" and "looking" go hand-in-hand, eventually becoming an integral part of life itself.

SkillList.Name: Glare of the Other
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Quantum DMG to a single target and delays the attacked target's action.

3012010.Name: Memory Zone Meme "Something In The Mirror"
3012010.Introduction:
An entity imbued with specific cognition, formed by the accumulation of subconscious fragments in the Memory Zone.
Life forms use mirrors to understand the world and build their self-cognition. The shapeless memetic entity reflects in the mirror, leaving behind ever-shifting mirages.

SkillList.Name: Mirror Cognition
SkillList.SkillDesc: Transforms into other friendly units and copies their abilities. After the transformation, this unit's Base Stats are inherited.

3012020.Name: Memory Zone Meme "Heartbreaker"
3012020.Introduction:
An entity imbued with specific cognition, formed by the accumulation of subconscious fragments in the Memory Zone.
Life is parceled in impenetrable barriers, obstructing the intrusion of the alien. But beneath that ironclad shell, there is a region both nameless and fragile.

SkillList.Name: Structural Deviation
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Aegis of the Unyielding
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Safeguard state. When not Weakness Broken, reduces DMG received. Once Weakness is Broken, action will be delayed. After Weakness is Broken, increases DMG received.

3012030.Name: Sombrous Sepulcher
3012030.Introduction:
Shattered existences serve as symbols of ultimate closure. Across the ethereal expanse, spirits cast their gaze upon the mortal realm, their eyes reflecting the etchings of oblivion and separation.
Innocent souls slumber within the Sombrous Sepulcher. Defeat the Tomb to awaken them.

SkillList.Name: Slumber Awakening
SkillList.SkillDesc: After Sombrous Sepulcher receives a killing blow, dispels Morbid Dream from the corresponding target, restoring their HP and regenerating Energy.

SkillList.Name: Temporal Departure
SkillList.SkillDesc: Sombrous Sepulcher will not take action.

SkillList.Name: Eternal Continuation
SkillList.SkillDesc: Sombrous Sepulcher has a fixed amount of HP bars. Each time it is attacked, Weakness Broken, or receives DMG from DoT, 1 bar of HP will be depleted.

3012031.Name: Sombrous Sepulcher
3012031.Introduction:
Shattered existences serve as symbols of ultimate closure. Across the ethereal expanse, spirits cast their gaze upon the mortal realm, their eyes reflecting the etchings of oblivion and separation.
Innocent souls slumber within the Sombrous Sepulcher. Defeat the Tomb to awaken them.

3012040.Name: Memory Zone Meme "Insatiable Vanity"
3012040.Introduction:
An entity imbued with specific cognition, formed by the accumulation of subconscious fragments in the Memory Zone.
The boasting of bystanders, the clinging of the weak, the flattery of the servile... The endless vanity shifts into a memetic lifeform, seeking a host that covets both fame and fortune.

SkillList.Name: Crowned in Mortal Name
SkillList.SkillDesc: Possesses a single friendly target and applies the Deception's Crown state, dispels the target's control effect and restoring their Toughness.

SkillList.Name: The Authentic Plunges
SkillList.SkillDesc: Friendly units in the Deception's Crown state restore HP after being attacked but additionally gain Physical and Fire-Type Weaknesses, and take increased Break DMG. When this unit is defeated or Weakness Broken, dispels the Deception's Crown state and defeats Insatiable Vanity.

3013010.Name: Memory Zone Meme "Shell of Faded Rage"
3013010.Introduction:
An entity imbued with specific cognition, formed by the accumulation of subconscious fragments in the Memory Zone.
Memories of anguish burn like flames, scorching the heart. When the suffering fades away, the life born from resentment will rise from the ashes, accumulating boundless fury.

SkillList.Name: Grudging Courtesy
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Quantum DMG to a single target and gains 1 stack of Obscure Blaze.

SkillList.Name: Roar of Furious Thunder
SkillList.SkillDesc: Gains 3 stacks of Obscure Blaze.

SkillList.Name: Tide of Enduring Grudges
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Quantum DMG to all targets and gains 1 stack of Obscure Blaze.

SkillList.Name: Bonepiercing Odium
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor successive Quantum DMG to a random target. Each stack of Obscure Blaze additionally deals DMG 1 time.

SkillList.Name: Disembodied Shell
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Safeguard state. When not Weakness Broken, reduces DMG received. Once Weakness is Broken, action will be additionally delayed. After Weakness is Broken, increases DMG received.

3013011.Name: Memory Zone Meme "Shell of Faded Rage"
3013011.Introduction:

SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor successive Quantum DMG to a random target. Each stack of Obscure Blaze additionally deals DMG 1 time.

SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Safeguard state. When not Weakness Broken, reduces DMG received. Once Weakness is Broken, action will be additionally delayed. After Weakness is Broken, increases DMG received.

3014020.Name: Memory Zone Meme "Something Unto Death"
3014020.Introduction:
An entity imbued with specific cognition, formed by the accumulation of subconscious fragments in the Memory Zone.
A mysterious and dangerous Memory Zone Meme, seen as the "death" that shouldn't exist in dreams. Its sinister shadow wanders within the Twelve Hours, bringing unforeseen calamity wherever it goes. It spreads misfortune like a sharp blade, casting a shadow of death over beautiful dreams.

SkillList.Name: Funereal Kiss
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Sunken Rain
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: Biting Obituary
SkillList.SkillDesc: Greatly increases DMG dealt for 1 turn. This effect is removed when this unit becomes Weakness Broken.

SkillList.Name: Fading Radiance
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Sunset state. Gains 1 stack each time a character uses Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate. When Sunset reaches 3 stacks, immediately use Losing Eventide Light on the last-acting target. This effect is removed after using Losing Eventide Light once or after becoming Weakness Broken.

SkillList.Name: Losing Eventide Light
SkillList.SkillDesc: Immediately launches a killing blow on the last-acting target who used Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, and inflicts Morbid Dream on them.

SkillList.Name: Go Into That Good Night
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Nightfall state, regenerates energy for all targets, and locks onto the 2 targets who are due to act next. Uses Watery Dissolution in the next action.

SkillList.Name: Watery Dissolution
SkillList.SkillDesc: Immediately launches a killing blow on all locked-on targets and inflicts Morbid Dream on them. If there are no locked-on targets, launches a killing blow on 2 random targets and inflicts Morbid Dream on them.

SkillList.Name: Sad True Lover Never Find My Grave
SkillList.SkillDesc: Whenever a target gets inflicted with Morbid Dream, summons a corresponding Sombrous Sepulcher. When all targets get inflicted with Morbid Dream or are knocked down, this battle will be considered a defeat.

SkillList.SkillDesc: When receiving a killing blow, targets will additionally gain one stack of Soul Enhancement.

3022010.Name: Echo of Faded Dreams
3022010.Introduction: The echoes of the memories someone once held of their beloved family. Across the long night, they will accompany him in the past, present, and future.

SkillList.Name: Imbue Devotion
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

SkillList.Name: Spear & Shield
SkillList.SkillDesc: Randomly summons statues of "Speartip," "The Shield," and "The Honored."

SkillList.SkillDesc: Casts a Soul of Beauty from one of the statues and causes the ability of the statue that cast the soul to be enhanced.

SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: Spear & Shield
SkillList.SkillDesc: Randomly summons statues of "Speartip," "The Shield," and "The Honored."

3024011.Name: Argenti (Complete)
3024011.Introduction: A complete projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is a paragon among the Knights of Beauty.

SkillList.Name: Sin and Absolution

SkillList.Name: Knights
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons 4 Speartips. If statues are currently present on the field, heal their HP back to full.

SkillList.Name: Martyrdom of Grandiosity
SkillList.SkillDesc: After every use of Hymn of Gorgeous Courage, increases DMG. This effect is stackable.

3024013.Name: Silver Knight of Virtuous Gallantry
3024013.Introduction:
