SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Imbue Devotion
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

SkillList.Name: Hymn of Gorgeous Courage
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: Lance's Summon
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons 4 statues of Speartips. If 4 statues of Speartip already exist on the field, use Sweeping Lance.

SkillList.Name: Shield's Summon
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons 4 statues of The Shield.

SkillList.Name: Honored Multitudes
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summon 4 statues of The Honored.

SkillList.Name: Sweeping Lance
SkillList.SkillDesc: Releases the power in the Speartip statue and deals Physical DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: Shield's Retribution
SkillList.SkillDesc: Releases the power in The Shield statue. Commands The Shield statue to Taunt the target directly facing the statue, and adjusts the statue's Weakness Type according to the targets facing it.

SkillList.Name: Strength of Honor
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters an unselectable state. In the next turn, use Undeniable Fate.

SkillList.Name: Soul Regained
SkillList.SkillDesc: Regains Soulfreed from all statues and Enhances this unit based on the number of Soulfreed, lasting for 1 turn.

SkillList.Name: Soulfreed
SkillList.SkillDesc: Silver Knight of Virtuous Gallantry will apply Soulfreed to the summoned statues. When the unit with Soulfreed is defeated, apply Soul Enhancement to all targets and increase all DMG dealt. If Silver Knight of Virtuous Gallantry regains Soulfreed, it will instead increase the DMG dealt by Silver Knight of Virtuous Gallantry in the next turn.

SkillList.Name: Undeniable Fate
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to all targets. Additionally, apply Physical DMG 1 time for every stack of Wreath.

SkillList.Name: Unstoppable Momentum
SkillList.SkillDesc: Damage received by Silver Knight of Virtuous Gallantry is greatly reduced. However, after being Weakness Broken, its action is additionally delayed and it receives more DMG, as well as recovering all targets' Skill Points and activating all targets' Ultimates.

SkillList.Name: Reversal of Fortune
SkillList.SkillDesc: The Silver Knight of Virtuous Gallantry can switch their own <u>Combat Stance</u> in battle and summon different statues to fight. When characters defeat statues in the Soulfreed state, DMG dealt by the team in this battle will be increased.

SkillList.Name: Turn Back the Tide
SkillList.SkillDesc: When the Silver Knight of Virtuous Gallantry uses Soulfreed in their second phase, they will target all the statues.

SkillList.Name: Stellar Aegis
SkillList.SkillDesc: For every unit on the enemy's side of the field aside from the Silver Knight of Virtuous Gallantry, all enemies receive less DMG and deal more DMG.

SkillList.Name: Knights

SkillList.Name: Martyrdom of Grandiosity
SkillList.SkillDesc: After every use of Hymn of Gorgeous Courage, increases DMG. This effect is stackable.

3024020.Name: Stellaron Hunter: Sam
3024020.Introduction: One of the Stellaron Hunters, a mysterious warrior donning formidable armor. The mech suit wields the power to unleash fiery onslaughts, engulfing the battlefield in flames.

SkillList.Name: BHF: Fiery Advance
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: BHF: Heavenly Fire
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single target and any adjacent targets.

SkillList.Name: BBHF: Scorched Earth
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Fire DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: DHGDR: Secondary Combustion
SkillList.SkillDesc: Consumes HP to enter the Secondary Combustion state and dispels the Weakness Protected effect. Becomes significantly more powerful in this state, but all attacks consume HP.

SkillList.Name: DHGDR: Supernova Overload
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Fire DMG to all targets, with a high chance to Burn them.

SkillList.Name: SGE: Molten Core
SkillList.SkillDesc: After entering Secondary Combustion, Combusts both the area and targets' Skill Points. When consuming Combusted Skill Points, targets lose HP and additionally deal a set amount of Fire DMG equal to a certain percentage of the original DMG. When they receive healing from sources other than oneself, the amount of HP restored is massively reduced.

SkillList.Name: SGE: Molten Engine
SkillList.SkillDesc: While in Secondary Combustion, Sam possesses Molten Energy. When Sam is attacked and the attack consumes Skill Points, a corresponding amount of Molten Energy is reduced. When Molten Energy is depleted or when the Weakness is Broken, dispels Secondary Combustion. When Secondary Combustion is dispelled, Sam receives increased DMG, and recovers all Skill Points for the targets.

SkillList.Name: DHGDR: Fire and Cinders
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Fire DMG to a single target. When using the ability, the more Molten Energy stacks there are, the higher the damage dealt.

SkillList.Name: SEG: Thermocumulative Upgrade
SkillList.SkillDesc: Whenever Sam loses HP due to the Secondary Combustion effect while attacking, increase the DMG they deal.

SkillList.Name: SEG: Thermobaric Field
SkillList.SkillDesc: When a target uses Combusted Skill Points or receives Burn DMG, inflict <u>Immolation</u> on the target. When Sam dispels the Secondary Combustion, the <u>Immolation</u> effect is removed.

3025010.Name: "Harmonious Choir" The Great Septimus
3025010.Introduction: Dominicus, the wisher of the Harmonious Choir, is one of the many embodiments of Xipe the Harmony. Due to the interferences from the Order, his appearance is different from before. Materialized as the Hive Mind's response to wishes, the hymns he conducts can reshape the world and create new laws per the wishes, and all who made this wish will become the source of his power.

SkillList.Name: Grazioso
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Maestoso
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: Vaneggiando
SkillList.SkillDesc: Makes a single target have a high chance of entering <u>Alien Dream</u>.

SkillList.Name: Accelerando
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Charging state. Uses "Volteggiando" in the next turn.

SkillList.Name: Accrescendo
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Charging state. Uses "Tempestoso" in the next turn.

SkillList.Name: Volteggiando
SkillList.SkillDesc: Makes all Echoes of Faded Dreams that can take action deal Imaginary DMG to a single target. If there are no Echoes of Faded Dreams that can take action, then this ability will fail to launch. After using this ability, restore Toughness for Echoes of Faded Dreams.

SkillList.Name: Volteggiando
SkillList.SkillDesc: Makes all Echoes of Faded Dreams that can take action deal Imaginary DMG to a single target. If there are no Echoes of Faded Dreams that can take action, then this ability will fail to launch. After using this ability, restore Toughness for Echoes of Faded Dreams.

SkillList.Name: Tempestoso
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets, and makes all Echoes of Faded Dreams that can take action deal Imaginary DMG to all targets. After using this ability, restores Toughness for Echoes of Faded Dreams.

SkillList.Name: Allargando
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the "If We Live In the Light" state, gains a Shield, increases the DMG dealt, decreases the DMG taken, and makes Toughness immune to reduction.

SkillList.Name: Im Anfang war das Wort
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Charging state. After 7 turns, uses "Im Anfang war die Tat."

SkillList.Name: Im Anfang war die Tat
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to all targets. This DMG application ignores the targets' DEF.

SkillList.Name: Work of Creation
SkillList.SkillDesc: "Embryo of Philosophy" Sunday has weaknesses of all Types. While "Embryo of Philosophy" Sunday is in the "Im Anfang war die Kraft" state, it will immediately take action after every action taken by targets and becomes immune to action delay effects caused by targets. When it becomes Weakness Broken, its action is additionally delayed. Moreover, after one stack of its Toughness is Broken, it applies <u>Walk in the Light</u> to targets.

SkillList.Name: Come Un Sogno
SkillList.SkillDesc: "Harmonious Choir" The Great Septimus summons 4 "Echoes of Faded Dreams." The DMG dealt to the Echoes of Faded Dreams is completely redistributed to "Harmonious Choir" The Great Septimus instead. When this unit and Echoes of Faded Dreams become Weakness Broken, additionally delays action. For every stack of this unit's Toughness that is broken, apply the <u>Walk in the Light</u> state to targets.

The DMG dealt to the Echoes of Faded Dreams is completely redistributed to "Harmonious Choir" The Great Septimus instead. When this unit and Echoes of Faded Dreams become Weakness Broken, additionally delays action. For every stack of this unit's Toughness that is broken, apply the <u>Walk in the Light</u> state to targets.

3025013.Name: Cacophonic Conductor
3025013.Introduction: Dominicus, the wisher of the Harmonious Choir, is one of the many embodiments of Xipe the Harmony. Due to the interferences from the Order, his appearance is different from before. Materialized as the Hive Mind's response to wishes, the hymns he conducts can reshape the world and create new laws per the wishes, and all who made this wish will become the source of his power.

SkillList.Name: Grazioso
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to one designated target.

SkillList.Name: Maestoso
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: Vaneggiando
SkillList.SkillDesc: Makes one designated target have a high chance of entering "<u>Alien Dream</u>."

SkillList.Name: Variation
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Charging state. Uses "Dancing in Dreams" in the next turn.

SkillList.Name: Melisma
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Charging state. Uses "Singing in Rain" in the next turn, while also restoring all "Echoes of Faded Dreams"' Toughness.

SkillList.Name: Dancing in Dreams
SkillList.SkillDesc: Makes all Echoes of Faded Dreams that can take action deal Imaginary DMG to one designated target. If there are no Echoes of Faded Dreams that can take action, then this ability fails to launch and reduces a massive amount of Toughness.

SkillList.Name: Dancing in Dreams
SkillList.SkillDesc: Makes all Echoes of Faded Dreams that can take action deal Imaginary DMG to one designated target. If there are no Echoes of Faded Dreams that can take action, then this ability fails to launch and reduces a massive amount of Toughness.

SkillList.Name: Singing in Rain
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets, and makes all Echoes of Faded Dreams that can take action deal Imaginary DMG to all targets. If there are no Echoes of Faded Dreams that can take action, then this ability fails to launch and reduces a massive amount of Toughness.

SkillList.Name: Phonation Unbound
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the "One With the Light" state, gains a Shield, and increases the DMG dealt.

SkillList.Name: Im Anfang war das Wort
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Charge state. After 7 turns, uses "Im Anfang war die Tat."

SkillList.Name: Im Anfang war die Tat
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to all targets. This DMG application ignores the targets' DEF.

SkillList.Name: Resonant Projection
SkillList.SkillDesc: While in the "Im Anfang war die Kraft" state, after every action taken by opposing targets, "Cacophonic Conductor" immediately takes action, and becomes immune to action delay effects caused by opposing targets. At the same time, the "Im Anfang war die Tat" tally will not be interrupted when this unit becomes Weakness Broken.

SkillList.Name: Grand Dream's Awakening
SkillList.SkillDesc: Cacophonic Conductor summons 4 Echoes of Faded Dreams. The DMG taken by the Echoes of Faded Dreams is completely redistributed to Cacophonic Conductor. At the same time, any currently Weakness Broken Echoes of Faded Dreams recover Toughness after turn taken by this unit. After each stack of this unit Toughness is depleted, applies "<u>Walk in the Light</u>" to the ally team.

3025014.Name: "Harmonious Choir" The Great Septimus
3025014.Introduction: Dominicus, the wisher of the Harmonious Choir, is one of the many embodiments of Xipe the Harmony. Due to the interferences from the Order, his appearance is different from before. Materialized as the Hive Mind's response to wishes, the hymns he conducts can reshape the world and create new laws per the wishes, and all who made this wish will become the source of his power.

SkillList.Name: Grazioso
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to one designated target.

SkillList.Name: Maestoso
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: Vaneggiando
SkillList.SkillDesc: Makes one designated target have a high chance of entering "<u>Alien Dream</u>."

SkillList.Name: Accelerando
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Charging state. Uses "Volteggiando" in the next turn.

SkillList.Name: Accrescendo
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Charging state. Uses "Tempestoso" in the next turn.

SkillList.Name: Volteggiando
SkillList.SkillDesc: Makes all "Echoes of Faded Dreams" that can take action deal Imaginary DMG to a single target. If there are no "Echoes of Faded Dreams" that can take action, then this ability will fail to launch. After using this ability, restore Toughness for "Echoes of Faded Dreams".

SkillList.Name: Volteggiando
SkillList.SkillDesc: Makes all "Echoes of Faded Dreams" that can take action deal Imaginary DMG to a single target. If there are no "Echoes of Faded Dreams" that can take action, then this ability will fail to launch. After using this ability, restore Toughness for "Echoes of Faded Dreams".

SkillList.Name: Tempestoso
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets, and makes all "Echoes of Faded Dreams" that can take action deal Imaginary DMG to all targets. After using this ability, restores Toughness for "Echoes of Faded Dreams".

SkillList.Name: Allargando
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the "If We Live In the Light" state, gains a Shield, increases the DMG dealt, decreases the DMG taken, and makes Toughness immune to reduction.

SkillList.Name: Come Un Sogno
SkillList.SkillDesc: "Harmonious Choir" The Great Septimus summons 4 "Echoes of Faded Dreams". The DMG taken by the "Echoes of Faded Dreams" is completely redistributed to "Harmonious Choir" The Great Septimus instead. When this unit and "Echoes of Faded Dreams" become Weakness Broken, additionally delays action. For every stack of this unit's Toughness that is broken, apply <u>Walk in the Light</u> to the Party.

4012010.Name: Furiae Warrior
4012010.Introduction: A Titankin sculpted from "Strife." They are infused with Nikador's golden ichor. Their robust bodies are the shields of the army, and they use their stony corpus to cut off their foes, while their powerful limbs carry rations across the battlefield. They are also used as sparring partners by the soldiers of Kremnos.

SkillList.Name: Collision of the Third Orbit
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to one designated target. When "War Armor" stacks are not 0 on this unit, there is a chance to inflict "Reverberation" on the target. When this unit has 0 "War Armor" stacks, inflict "Reverberation" on this unit.

SkillList.Name: Polis Protector
SkillList.SkillDesc: Possesses a number of "War Armor" stacks, which decreases DMG taken. Loses 1 stack of "War Armor" on this unit after being attacked. When at 0 stacks, "War Armor" will be destroyed, dealing massive Imaginary DMG to this unit and delaying their action. The target that destroyed "War Armor" will regenerate Energy. After "War Armor" is destroyed, this unit will also additionally take minor Imaginary DMG when attacked. "War Armor" will be restored to maximum stacks at the end of this unit's turn.

4012020.Name: Furiae Philosopher
4012020.Introduction: A Titankin sculpted from "Strife." They are infused with Nikador's golden ichor. They contain plundered "rationality" within their vessels. The reason behind their creation is not truly toward the study of universal knowledge, but to delve deep into brutal martial tactics and the merciless laws of survival, further spreading madness masquerading as philosophy.

SkillList.Name: Just War
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the "Proselytize" state, increasing one friendly unit's SPD and DMG dealt.

SkillList.Name: War, Father of All
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to one designated target.

SkillList.Name: Living Eternal Flame
SkillList.SkillDesc: When receiving a killing blow, increases the attacker's SPD and DMG dealt.

SkillList.Name: Polis Protector
SkillList.SkillDesc: Possesses a number of "War Armor" stacks, which decreases DMG taken. Loses 1 stack of "War Armor" on this unit after being attacked. When at 0 stacks, "War Armor" will be destroyed, dealing massive Imaginary DMG to this unit and delaying their action. The target that destroyed "War Armor" will regenerate Energy. After "War Armor" is destroyed, this unit will also additionally take minor Imaginary DMG when attacked. "War Armor" will be restored to maximum stacks at the end of this unit's turn.

The reason behind their creation is not truly toward the study of universal knowledge, but to delve deep into brutal martial tactics and the merciless laws of survival, further spreading madness masquerading as philosophy.

SkillList.Name: War, Father of All
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to one designated target.

SkillList.Name: Living Eternal Flame
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the "Safeguard" state. This unit receives fatal damage when its Weakness is Broken, advancing the action of the unit that triggered the break and increasing their Break Effect.

SkillList.Name: Polis Protector
SkillList.SkillDesc: Possesses a number of "War Armor" stacks, which decreases DMG taken. Loses 1 stack of "War Armor" on this unit after being attacked. When at 0 stacks, "War Armor" will be destroyed, dealing massive Imaginary DMG to this unit and delaying their action. The target that destroyed "War Armor" will regenerate Energy. After "War Armor" is destroyed, this unit will also additionally take minor Imaginary DMG when attacked. "War Armor" will be restored to maximum stacks at the end of this unit's turn.

4012030.Name: Furiae Archer
4012030.Introduction: A Titankin sculpted by "Strife." They are infused with Nikador's golden ichor. With faith as steadfast as flying arrows, they are the means to find prey for Kremnos's forces, hunting down beasts and foes across the wastes, and ensuring none survive within firing range.

SkillList.Name: Weeping Arrow
SkillList.SkillDesc: Launches several rounds of attacks from the right side of the ally team, and delivers a 1 time priority attack to each ally target, with the remaining attack counts attacking random ally targets. Each attack deals minor Lightning DMG. When a target is hit more than once in this ability, additionally deals Lightning DMG. When the "War Armor" stack reaches 0, the next attack count of "Weeping Arrow" will be reduced.

SkillList.Name: Polis Protector
SkillList.SkillDesc: Possesses a number of "War Armor" stacks, which decreases DMG taken. Loses 1 stack of "War Armor" on this unit after being attacked. When at 0 stacks, "War Armor" will be destroyed, dealing massive Imaginary DMG to this unit and delaying their action. The target that destroyed "War Armor" will regenerate Energy. After "War Armor" is destroyed, this unit will also additionally take minor Imaginary DMG when attacked. "War Armor" will be restored to maximum stacks at the end of this unit's turn.

4012040.Name: Furiae Troupe
4012040.Introduction: A Titankin sculpted from "Strife." They are infused with Nikador's golden ichor. They are singers under the Lance of Fury. In their lyrics come praises for soldiers and the mad king, using divine spells to call upon Nikador's blessings.

SkillList.Name: Praise Nikador
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the "War Song" state. Increases max "War Armor" stacks for friendly units aside from this unit. When entering battle, immediately enters the "War Song" state.

SkillList.Name: Into the Supple Fire
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to one designated ally target and adjacent targets.

After "War Armor" is destroyed, this unit will also additionally take minor Imaginary DMG when attacked. "War Armor" will be restored to maximum stacks at the end of this unit's turn.

4012050.Name: "Spirithief" Bartholos
4012050.Introduction: The twin sprites roaming the wilds and alleys of Amphoreus, taking pleasure in stealing valuables and playing tricks on travelers. They often outpace Treasure Hunters at the last moment, leaving only a coin as a harmless joke.

SkillList.Name: Brainteaser-Repeating Pun
SkillList.SkillDesc: "Bartholos" presents a brainteaser, entering the "Brainteaser" state. Targets can respond with "Basic ATK," "Skill," or "Ultimate."

SkillList.Name: Brainteaser-Repeating Pun
SkillList.SkillDesc: "Bartholos" presents a brainteaser, entering the "Brainteaser" state. Targets can respond with "Basic ATK," "Skill," or "Ultimate."

SkillList.Name: Brainteaser-Repeating Pun
SkillList.SkillDesc: "Bartholos" presents a brainteaser, entering the "Brainteaser" state. Targets can respond with "Basic ATK," "Skill," or "Ultimate."

SkillList.Name: Looping Explanation
SkillList.SkillDesc: Use the correct attack method to respond to "Bartholos"'s brainteaser, and "Bartholos" will immediately change the brainteaser, taking Physical DMG based on a percentage of its Max HP. When "Bartholos" leaves the battle, increases the DMG dealt by all targets.

4012051.Name: "Spirithief" Bartholos
4012051.Introduction: The twin sprites roaming the wilds and alleys of Amphoreus, taking pleasure in stealing valuables and playing tricks on travelers. They often outpace Treasure Hunters at the last moment, leaving only a coin as a harmless joke.

SkillList.Name: Brainteaser-Repeating Pun
SkillList.SkillDesc: "Bartholos" presents a brainteaser, entering the "Brainteaser" state. Targets can respond with "Skill" or "Ultimate."

SkillList.Name: Brainteaser-Repeating Pun
SkillList.SkillDesc: "Bartholos" presents a brainteaser, entering the "Brainteaser" state. Targets can respond with "Skill" or "Ultimate."

SkillList.Name: Brainteaser-Repeating Pun
SkillList.SkillDesc: "Bartholos" presents a brainteaser, entering the "Brainteaser" state. Targets can respond with "Skill" or "Ultimate."

SkillList.Name: Looping Explanation
SkillList.SkillDesc: Use the correct attack method to respond to "Bartholos"'s brainteaser, and "Bartholos" will immediately leave combat. When "Bartholos" is attacked with a "Basic ATK" or an attack from friendly targets, it will change the brainteaser.

4012060.Name: Conquer or Be Conquered
4012060.Introduction:
The tip of its spear has drawn a boundless border.
The people and soldiers within the border are marked as conquered, or ones to be conquered.
The blood of the fearful will become honey for the divine body, and the souls of the defiant will walk into the palace of glory under the River of Souls.

SkillList.Name: Tyrant of the Vanquished
SkillList.SkillDesc: "Conquer or Be Conquered" will not take action.

SkillList.Name: Bearing All Wounds
SkillList.SkillDesc: When attacked by a target with the corresponding "Conquered" state, the DMG taken increases greatly. When receiving a killing blow, consumes the HP of "The Giver, Master of Legions, Lance of Fury."

4013010.Name: Furiae Praetor
4013010.Introduction:
A Titankin sculpted from "Strife." They are infused with Nikador's golden ichor. They are mighty constructs capable of housing a Titan's soul. With their greatswords, they stand ready to repel the rush of the black tide or turn their blade in a countering onslaught in times of war.
Furiae Praetor will sacrifice their weaker kin, exchanging atrocity for divine punishments from the Titan.

SkillList.Name: From Skyveil to Dawn
SkillList.SkillDesc: Starting from the leftmost ally target, uses a sweeping attack on 3 consecutive ally targets, dealing minor Imaginary DMG.

SkillList.Name: From Dawn to Skyveil
SkillList.SkillDesc: Starting from the rightmost ally target, uses a sweeping attack on 3 consecutive ally targets, dealing minor Imaginary DMG.

SkillList.Name: Resembling Furious Lion
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Charging state. Uses "Drowned in the Crimson Sea" in the next turn.

SkillList.Name: Drowned in the Crimson Sea
SkillList.SkillDesc: Absorbs "Furiae Warrior," then deals massive Imaginary DMG to all ally targets and inflicts Vulnerability on them. The DMG and Vulnerability states are <u>distributed evenly</u> among the targets. The more "Furiae Warriors" absorbed, the higher the DMG dealt.

SkillList.Name: Rise from the Grave
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons "Furiae Warrior."

SkillList.Name: Polis Protector
SkillList.SkillDesc: Possesses a number of "War Armor" stacks, which decreases DMG taken. Loses 1 stack of "War Armor" on this unit after being attacked. When at 0 stacks, "War Armor" will be destroyed, dealing massive Imaginary DMG to this unit and delaying their action. The target that destroyed "War Armor" will regenerate Energy. After "War Armor" is destroyed, this unit will also additionally take minor Imaginary DMG when attacked. "War Armor" will be restored to maximum stacks at the end of this unit's turn.

Furiae Praetor will sacrifice their weaker kin, exchanging atrocity for divine punishments from the Titan.

SkillList.Name: From Dawn to Skyveil
SkillList.SkillDesc: Starting from the rightmost ally target, uses a sweeping attack on 3 consecutive ally targets, dealing minor Imaginary DMG.

SkillList.Name: Resembling Furious Lion
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Charging state and absorbs adjacent targets. Uses "Drowned in the Crimson Sea" in the next turn.

SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to all ally targets and inflicts "Vulnerability" on them. The DMG and "Vulnerability" are <u>distributed evenly</u> among the targets.

SkillList.Name: Rise from the Grave
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons "Furiae Warrior."

SkillList.Name: Polis Protector
SkillList.SkillDesc: Possesses a number of "War Armor" stacks, which decreases DMG taken. Loses 1 stack of "War Armor" on this unit when attacked. When at 0 stacks, immediately uses "Resembling Furious Lion." After absorbing targets, deals massive Imaginary DMG to all friendly units and regenerate Energy to the target that destroyed "War Armor." After "War Armor" is destroyed, this unit will also additionally take minor Imaginary DMG when attacked. "War Armor" will be restored to maximum stacks at the end of this unit's turn.

4014010.Name: Savage God, Mad King, Incarnation of Strife
4014010.Introduction:
The Titan of Strife continues the mad war in their frenzy, becoming the unconquerable fear of the masses of Amphoreus.
They once were famed through glory, earning respect from gods and from the people of the land. And yet, the city that revered them was sundered, and the poems that praised their name were destroyed. Only their evil reputation lingers in this lightless era and end times, tainting the Throne of Worlds's brilliance.

SkillList.Name: Lightning Spear of the Firmament
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to one designated ally target.

SkillList.Name: Worldsplitting Spine
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to one designated target and adjacent targets.

SkillList.Name: Hewing of the River of Souls
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to one designated ally target.

SkillList.Name: Survivors Unto Dead Waters
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to one designated ally target.

SkillList.Name: Unceasing Flames of War
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to all ally targets.

SkillList.Name: Pyre of High Graves
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to all ally targets.

SkillList.Name: Sky-Piercing Lance
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals successive minor Imaginary DMG to random single ally targets.

SkillList.Name: Ruination of Night and Light
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals successive minor Imaginary DMG to random single ally targets.

SkillList.Name: Calamity Eternal
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to all ally targets and apply <u>"Glory"</u>. At the same time, this unit obtains "Titanic Corpus." When "Titanic Corpus" stacks are reduced to 0, this unit's action is delayed, takes massive Imaginary DMG, and regenerates Energy for all targets. Possessing "Titanic Corpus" will greatly increase the DMG dealt by the next attack, with a high chance of inflicting Imprisonment on all attacked targets.

SkillList.Name: All Realms Leveled, All Legions to Dust
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to all ally targets. The DMG is <u>distributed evenly</u> among the targets.

SkillList.Name: Polis Protector
SkillList.SkillDesc: Possesses a number of "War Armor" stacks, which decreases DMG taken. Loses 1 stack of "War Armor" on this unit after being attacked. When at 0 stacks, "War Armor" will be destroyed, dealing massive Imaginary DMG to this unit and delaying their action. The target that destroyed "War Armor" will regenerate Energy. After "War Armor" is destroyed, this unit will also additionally take minor Imaginary DMG when attacked. "War Armor" will be restored to maximum stacks at the end of this unit's turn.

SkillList.Name: Better to Die in Battle Than to Return Even in Glory
SkillList.SkillDesc: When using "Calamity Eternal," apply <u>"Glory"</u> to all targets. Every stack of <u>"Glory"</u> increases DMG dealt and Energy Regeneration Rate. When the affected target uses Skill or Ultimate, <u>"Glory"</u> can be stacked. After the next action by "Savage God, Mad King, Incarnation of Strife," dispel <u>"Glory"</u> from all targets.

Possessing "Titanic Corpus" will greatly increase the DMG dealt by the next attack, with a high chance of inflicting Imprisonment on all attacked targets.

SkillList.Name: All Realms Leveled, All Legions to Dust
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to all ally targets. The DMG is <u>distributed evenly</u> among the targets.

SkillList.Name: Polis Protector
SkillList.SkillDesc: Possesses a number of "War Armor" stacks, which decreases DMG taken. Loses 1 stack of "War Armor" on this unit after being attacked. When at 0 stacks, "War Armor" will be destroyed, dealing massive Imaginary DMG to this unit and delaying their action. The target that destroyed "War Armor" will regenerate Energy. After "War Armor" is destroyed, this unit will also additionally take minor Imaginary DMG when attacked. "War Armor" will be restored to maximum stacks at the end of this unit's turn.

SkillList.Name: Better to Die in Battle Than to Return Even in Glory
SkillList.SkillDesc: When using "Calamity Eternal," apply <u>"Glory"</u> to all targets. Every stack of <u>"Glory"</u> increases DMG dealt and Energy Regeneration Rate. When the affected target uses Skill or Ultimate, <u>"Glory"</u> can be stacked. After the next action by "Savage God, Mad King, Incarnation of Strife," dispel <u>"Glory"</u> from all targets.

4014012.Name: Savage God, Mad King, Incarnation of Strife
4014012.Introduction:
The Titan of Strife continues the mad war in their frenzy, becoming the unconquerable fear of the masses of Amphoreus.
They once were famed through glory, earning respect from gods and from the people of the land. And yet, the city that revered them was sundered, and the poems that praised their name were destroyed. Only their evil reputation lingers in this lightless era and end times, tainting the Throne of Worlds's brilliance.

SkillList.Name: Lightning Spear of the Firmament
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to one designated ally target.

SkillList.Name: Worldsplitting Spine
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to one designated target and adjacent targets.

SkillList.Name: Hewing of the River of Souls
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to one designated ally target.

SkillList.Name: Survivors Unto Dead Waters
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to one designated ally target.

SkillList.Name: Unceasing Flames of War
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to all ally targets.

SkillList.Name: Pyre of High Graves
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to all ally targets.

SkillList.Name: Sky-Piercing Lance
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals successive minor Imaginary DMG to random single ally targets.

SkillList.Name: Ruination of Night and Light
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals successive minor Imaginary DMG to random single ally targets.

SkillList.Name: Calamity Eternal
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to all ally targets and apply <u>"Glory"</u>. At the same time, this unit obtains "Titanic Corpus." When "Titanic Corpus" stacks are reduced to 0, this unit's action is delayed, takes massive Imaginary DMG, and regenerates Energy for all targets. Possessing "Titanic Corpus" will greatly increase the DMG dealt by the next attack, with a high chance of inflicting Imprisonment on all attacked targets.

SkillList.Name: All Realms Leveled, All Legions to Dust
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to all ally targets. The DMG is <u>distributed evenly</u> among the targets.

SkillList.Name: Polis Protector
SkillList.SkillDesc: Possesses a number of "War Armor" stacks, which decreases DMG taken. Loses 1 stack of "War Armor" on this unit after being attacked. When at 0 stacks, "War Armor" will be destroyed, dealing massive Imaginary DMG to this unit and delaying their action. The target that destroyed "War Armor" will regenerate Energy. After "War Armor" is destroyed, this unit will also additionally take minor Imaginary DMG when attacked. "War Armor" will be restored to maximum stacks at the end of this unit's turn.

SkillList.Name: Better to Die in Battle Than to Return Even in Glory
SkillList.SkillDesc: When using "Calamity Eternal," apply <u>"Glory"</u> to all targets. Every stack of <u>"Glory"</u> increases DMG dealt and Energy Regeneration Rate. When the affected target uses Skill or Ultimate, <u>"Glory"</u> can be stacked. After the next action by "Savage God, Mad King, Incarnation of Strife," dispel <u>"Glory"</u> from all targets.

4014020.Name: The Giver, Master of Legions, Lance of Fury
4014020.Introduction:
The undefeated. The sovereign of all battles. The king of Castrum Kremnos and of ruins,
Grand Artisan of the war chariot, the throne upon a mountain of corpses, and father of victory,
The usurper of glories, the lightning that split the sea, the Guardian of Amphoreus,
The Titan of Strife, the Lance of Fury: Nikador.
A general that all the world should heed, the eternal sharp sword, the law of Strife and of ending Strife.
Praise Nikador, greatest of conquerors, greatest of guardians.

SkillList.Name: The Vanquished Behold Woe
SkillList.SkillDesc: Every target character generates 1 corresponding "Conquer or Be Conquered," which inflicts "Conquered" to the corresponding character. "Conquered" will decrease the character's Maximum Restorable HP. Decreasing the HP of the corresponding "Conquer or Be Conquered" can restore an equal percentage of the character's Maximum Restorable HP.

SkillList.Name: Glory to All Honorable Dead
SkillList.SkillDesc: Apply "Strife-Granted Fear" to all target characters. When "Conquered" is dispelled, the corresponding "Strife-Granted Fear" is also dispelled.

SkillList.Name: Fury Falls, and All Bows to Strife
SkillList.SkillDesc: Controls "Savage God, Mad King, Incarnation of Strife" to deal Imaginary DMG to all ally target characters based on a percentage of their Max HP. This DMG ignores the target's DEF, with a high chance of applying Imprisonment to targets in the "Conquered" state.

SkillList.Name: The Fallen Feeds My Might
SkillList.SkillDesc: Absorbs remaining "Conquer or Be Conquered" to enhance "Savage God, Mad King, Incarnation of Strife." At the same time, adds Toughness Protection and dispels Crowd Control debuffs and Weakness Break debuffs on "Savage God, Mad King, Incarnation of Strife."

4043010.Name: Herta #ErrorModel
4043010.Introduction: A Herta puppet corrupted by a Memory Zone Meme. As it is a perfect model, it still looks exquisite and practical despite the errors consuming its parameters.

SkillList.Name: Converted Duplication
SkillList.SkillDesc: Transforms into up to 5 other friendly units.

8001010.Name: Flamespawn
8001010.Introduction: Crystallized elements with only the simplest intelligence. It drifts in the Fragmentum in the form of a bird emitting intense heat, burning everything in its path.

SkillList.Name: Distract
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single target.

8001020.Name: Frostspawn
8001020.Introduction: Crystallized elements with only the simplest intelligence. It drifts in the Fragmentum in the form of a bird releasing eerily low temperatures, freezing everything around it.

SkillList.Name: Distract
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Ice DMG to a single target.

8001030.Name: Mask of No Thought
8001030.Introduction: Victims of Fragmentum corrosion pieced together into one bizarre creature, their numb faces forming a sphere without thought or emotion. Any part that was once human has since vanished.

SkillList.Name: Iridescent Beam
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Focused Charge
SkillList.SkillDesc: Increases the ATK of all friendly units.

SkillList.Name: Energy Burst
SkillList.SkillDesc: All targets' Energy gets regenerated after this unit suffers a killing blow.

8001040.Name: Thunderspawn
8001040.Introduction: Crystallized elements with only the simplest intelligence. It drifts in the Fragmentum in the form of a bird brimming with electricity, releasing thunderclaps in all directions.

SkillList.Name: Thunderflash
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Shock the target.

8001050.Name: Windspawn
8001050.Introduction: Crystallized elements with only the simplest intelligence. It drifts in the Fragmentum in the form of a bird engulfed in twisting winds, raging on like a tornado.

SkillList.Name: Windpath
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict Wind Shear.

8002010.Name: Imaginary Weaver
8002010.Introduction: Strange beings that do not belong to this world. Passing through countless barriers, they arrive from the other side of the vast, dark, starry sky. Their bodies are like diseased branches breaching into reality, using Imaginary power to twist reality at will.

SkillList.Name: Carolbeam
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Carolburst
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Imaginary DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Reverberating Carol
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target, and enters a Defensive Position. In the next turn, use Carolburst and massively increase the DMG dealt.

SkillList.Name: Imaginary Armor
SkillList.SkillDesc: Receives reduced DMG from non-Weakness Type attacks.

8002040.Name: Warp Trotter
8002040.Introduction: An interdimensional creature lost in the stars. Docile in nature. Sweet in taste. Inedible. Spends most of its life feeding and fleeing. Travelers who encounter these creatures see them as good omens.

SkillList.Name: SSSScared
SkillList.SkillDesc: The Treasure Trotter got spooked and will flee in 2 turns.

SkillList.Name: Run... Run!
SkillList.SkillDesc: The Treasure Trotter is panicking and will flee in 1 turn.

SkillList.Name: Phew... Escaped
SkillList.SkillDesc: The Trotter flees in an instant.

8003010.Name: Ice Out of Space
8003010.Introduction:
A strange being that does not belong to this world. Nurtured in the Fragmentum brought by the Stellaron, it feeds upon this world's root structures to obtain energy. Its armor reflects the gloomy and profound starry sky.
In combat, the Ice Out of Space will freeze targets it touches.

SkillList.Name: Chilling Lament
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Ice DMG to a single target. Deals extra Ice DMG to the target if the target is currently Frozen and this unit is in the Freezing Point state.

SkillList.Name: Frosty Absorption
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Freezing Point state. Everwinter Rain can be used in subsequent attacks.

SkillList.Name: Everwinter Rain
SkillList.SkillDesc: This ability is only available while in the Freezing Point state. Deals minor Ice DMG to all targets, with a chance to Freeze the targets.

SkillList.Name: Chilling Lament
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Ice DMG to a single target. There is a chance to Freeze the target if the user is in the Freezing Point state.

8003011.Name: Ice Out of Space (Bug)
8003011.Introduction:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is an alien life form that was born out of the Fragmentum brought by a Stellaron and feeds on this world's energy. Its armor reflects the gloomy and profound starry sky.
In combat, the Ice Out of Space (Bug) will freeze targets it touches and delay their actions.

SkillList.Name: Chilling Lament
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Ice DMG to a single target. Deals extra Ice DMG to the target if the target is currently Frozen and this unit is in the Freezing Point state.

SkillList.Name: Frosty Absorption
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Freezing Point state. Everwinter Rain can be used in subsequent attacks.

SkillList.Name: Everwinter Rain
SkillList.SkillDesc: The ability will only be used when in the Freezing Point state. Casting the ability to deal Ice DMG to all targets, with a chance to Freeze the targets and delay their actions.

SkillList.Name: Chilling Lament
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Ice DMG to a single target. There is a chance to Freeze the target if the user is in the Freezing Point state.

SkillList.Name: Freeze Burst
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Ice DMG to Frozen targets. This also removes their Frozen state and deals Ice DMG to their adjacent units.

8003020.Name: Blaze Out of Space
8003020.Introduction:
A strange being that does not belong to this world. Nurtured in the Fragmentum created by the Stellaron, it parasitize upon this world's root structures to obtain energy. Its armor burns with the blazing flames in the core of stars.
In combat, the Blaze Out of Space will incinerate anything it touches.

SkillList.Name: Bellowing Inferno
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single target and has a high chance to inflict Enkindle.

SkillList.Name: Blazing Absorption
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Spontaneous Combustion state. Rain of Purifying Flames can be used in subsequent attacks.

SkillList.Name: Rain of Purifying Flames
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals successive minor Fire DMG to a random single target, with a high chance to inflict Enkindle.

SkillList.Name: Molten Fusion
SkillList.SkillDesc: Gains ATK. This buff is dispelled upon Weakness Break.

8003030.Name: Guardian Shadow
8003030.Introduction:
A shadow manifested by the power of a Stellaron, carrying out the Fragmentum's unceasing will to expand.
A living being of energy born from the projection of the desires of sentient lifeforms into the Fragmentum, akin to a pearl created from a single grain of sand. This energy wanders around aimlessly, acting only when executing the will of its master.

8003050.Name: Stormbringer
8003050.Introduction:
Monsters that have experienced corrosion as the Fragmentum expanded. They now have a more nimble way of fighting after the source of their power mutated.
Stormbringers utilize the power of the wind to aid them in battle, enabling them to fire arrows more rapidly.

8011010.Name: Baryon
8011010.Introduction:
In order to prevent antiparticles from dissipating and annihilating normal matter, the Antimatter Legion created two types of miniature ion traps for transportation, collectively referred to as Baryons and Antibaryons.
Baryons have basic intelligence, and can clear the path according to the commands and summons of Voidrangers on the battlefield.

SkillList.Name: Obliterate
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Quantum DMG to a single target.

8011020.Name: Antibaryon
8011020.Introduction:
In order to prevent antiparticles from dissipating and annihilating normal matter, the Antimatter Legion created two types of miniature ion traps for transportation, collectively referred to as Baryons and Antibaryons.
Antibaryons have basic intelligence, and can clear the path according to the commands and summons of Voidrangers on the battlefield.

8012010.Name: Voidranger: Reaver
8012010.Introduction:
Warriors yet to perish were recast in the Warforge and gained Destruction's power. Antimatter completes their bodies and negative particles reverberate throughout their forms.
Violently aggressive, they embody the will of Destruction and are basic combat units of the Antimatter Legion, acting only according to their destructive instincts.

8012020.Name: Voidranger: Distorter
8012020.Introduction:
A Voidranger that has successfully survived particle annihilation, the positive and negative particles in its body have temporarily achieved a strange balance, granting them more power than ordinary reavers.
Basic combat units of the Antimatter Legion. They possess some intelligence and are able to control reavers within a small surrounding area.

SkillList.SkillDesc: After receiving a killing blow, dispels all debuffs afflicting the team and restores their HP. At the same time, deals a set amount of DMG to Opportunistic Provocateur and increases the targets' Destruction Buff level. Destruction Buff increases characters' Break Effect.

SkillList.Name: Safeguard
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Safeguard state. While not Weakness Broken, reduces DMG received. Once Weakness is Broken, action will be delayed. After Weakness is Broken, increases DMG received.

SkillList.Name: Eternal Condemnation
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to the locked-on target. The more locked-on targets there are, the higher the DMG.

8013010.Name: Voidranger: Trampler
8013010.Introduction:
A product of the Antimatter Legion utilizing the Warforge to recast and fuse remnants of fallen warriors and Leviathans.
Though relatively rare, they possess both the intelligence of a warrior and the power and mobility of a Leviathan. Its screech can summon a large number of Voidrangers.

8013141.Name: Antimatter Engine
8013141.Introduction:
The ultimate embodiment of power. The form of the energy that accumulates behind it remains unknown.
The Antimatter Engine will grant energy to other enemies and enhance their abilities.

SkillList.Name: Void Fission
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enhances Disaster's Right Hand, restoring its Toughness.

SkillList.Name: Calamity Strike
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enhances Dawn's Left Hand, restoring its Toughness.

SkillList.Name: Engine Boost

SkillList.Name: Total Annihilation

SkillList.Name: Cataclysm Precursor

SkillList.Name: Impending Doom
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Quantum DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: Engine Slit
SkillList.SkillDesc: The Antimatter Engine will change its Weakness Type every time it recovers from Weakness Break.

SkillList.SkillDesc: Applies "Amplification" to Dawn's Left Hand, increasing its Enhancement Level by 1.

SkillList.Name: Doomsday Curse
SkillList.SkillDesc: Randomly inflicts Quantum Infusion or Imaginary Infusion on all targets.

SkillList.Name: Mass Infection
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Quantum DMG and Imaginary DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: Ruinous Collision
SkillList.SkillDesc: When this unit uses their ability and causes a target to be in Quantum Infusion and Imaginary Infusion at the same time, dispels both Quantum Infusion and Imaginary Infusion on the target, and deals minor Quantum DMG and Imaginary DMG with a high chance of inflicting <u>Snarelock</u> to the target.

SkillList.Name: Feigned Death
SkillList.SkillDesc: After suffering a killing blow, enters Feigned Death.

8015010.Name: Doomsday Beast
8015010.Introduction: Using fragments of the Dusk Leviathan as the foundation, and the weeping bones of thousands of the dead in the Warforge as the agent, the Antimatter Legion cast the Doomsday Beast. The resentful spirits' senseless obsession turns into a tangible hand, and the shadow of the old disaster conceals the heavens. The Doomsday Beast detains the will of all beings that are not at ease and have yet to die. Anger, mourning, or delusional joy  all is revealed, and all evil eagerly throb. The Doomsday Beast's core is a dark matter engine.

SkillList.Name: Leviathan's Vestige Valor
SkillList.SkillDesc: The Doomsday Beast cannot be attacked until the Antimatter Engine, Disaster's Right Hand, and Dawn's Left Hand have all been destroyed.

8015011.Name: Doomsday Beast

SkillList.SkillDesc: Starbane Doombringer cannot be directly attacked until the Antimatter Engine, Disaster's Right Hand, and Dawn's Left Hand have all been destroyed. When dealing DMG to its parts, the Starbane Doombringer will also lose equal amounts of HP.

8015020.Name: Phantylia the Undying
8015020.Introduction:
The body born out of the Ambrosial Arbor by Phantylia, Lord Ravager of the Antimatter Legion.
This flesh possesses the powers of both Destruction and Abundance, a form that embodies the cycle of death and rebirth. It is also the first "fruit" borne from the rejuvenated Ambrosial Arbor.

SkillList.Name: Acchata: Forming Winds
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Wind DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Cleansing Sweep
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Wind DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: Weaving Roots
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Wind DMG to a single target and delays their action.

SkillList.Name: Burgeoning Bloom
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons Abundance Lotus.

SkillList.Name: Acchata: Roaring Thunder
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Starfall, Mooncry
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Lightning DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: Kalpa Descend
SkillList.SkillDesc: Locks on a target and causes Destruction Lotus to Bloom. At the same time, dispels Destruction Lotus' Weakness Protected effect. Destruction Lotus's will use Havoc during its next action.

SkillList.Name: Furor
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target and any adjacent targets.

SkillList.Name: Arbor Apotheosis

SkillList.Name: Cleansing Sweep

SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Wind DMG to a single target and delays their action. At the same time, allows all Abundance Lotus on the field that can take action to launch an attack.

SkillList.Name: Entwining Roots: Havoc's Might
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target and delays their action. At the same time, allows all Destruction Lotus on the field that can take action to launch an attack.

SkillList.SkillDesc: When receiving a killing blow, deals Wind DMG to all friendly units, with a high chance to slightly increase their DMG received.

SkillList.SkillDesc: Every stack of "Growth Hormones" increases ATK by a certain amount, stacking up to 3 times. Immediately take action when 3 stacks are reached.

8022030.Name: Gnaw Sting
8022030.Introduction: A subspecies of Stings that underwent mutations during reproduction, adept at using quantum toxins in their mandibles to corrode away the bodies of their prey.

SkillList.Name: Horn Clash
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Quantum DMG to a single target, prioritizing Entangled targets, and applies one extra stack of Entanglement.

SkillList.Name: Decay Eulogy
SkillList.SkillDesc: When receiving a killing blow, deals Quantum DMG to all friendly units and increases their DMG received.

8022031.Name: Gnaw Sting

SkillList.Name: Distract
SkillList.SkillDesc: Every stack of "Growth Hormones" increases ATK by a certain amount, stacking up to 3 times. When 3 stacks are reached and if the target attacked by "Horn Clash" is not in the Entanglement state, there is a high chance of afflicting them with Entanglement.

8024010.Name: Swarm: True Sting (Complete)
8024010.Introduction: A complete projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is a mature True Sting. Sir Duroy, a member of the Intelligentsia Guild, explored the starry seas and authored the thirty-volume of the Chronicles of Interdimensional Insects. The book provides detailed records of over a dozen confirmed species of lepisma and countless subspecies spanning across the stars.

SkillList.Name: Time to Battle
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict 2 stacks of Wind Shear.

SkillList.Name: War Gear
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single target. If the target is currently suffering from Wind Shear, Wind Shear immediately causes DMG 1 time.

SkillList.Name: Cyclonic Swarm

SkillList.Name: Propagation
SkillList.SkillDesc: Spawns True Stings.

SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Charging state. Uses Swarm Onslaught for the next action.

SkillList.Name: Swarm Onslaught
SkillList.SkillDesc: Dispels all Crowd Control debuffs and Weakness Break affecting True Stings. Deals Wind DMG to the target, and causes the target to have a high chance of being inflicted with 1 stack of Wind Shear every time they take DMG.

It was once one of the nightmares across multiple worlds during the Swarm Disaster.

SkillList.Name: Swarm King Cannon
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Quantum DMG to a single target

SkillList.Name: Radiating Venom
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Quantum DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict Entanglement. Also summons 1 Gnaw Sting.

SkillList.Name: Pyrolysis Death Beam
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Quantum DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

SkillList.Name: Carapace of Begotten Spawn
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Multiply state until the next action. During this time, DMG taken is greatly reduced, and each attack taken summons a Gnaw Sting. If this unit is Weakness Broken while in the Multiply state, it will reduce all friendly units' Toughness by an amount equal to this unit's Max Toughness and increase the DMG taken by all other friendly units besides the target themselves.

SkillList.Name: Ovum of Collapsed Star
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Quantum DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: Carapace of Nurtured Disaster
SkillList.SkillDesc: Starts Charging and enters the Multiply state until the next action, whereupon Ovum of Collapsed Star will be used on all targets. During the Multiply state, DMG received is greatly reduced, and each attack taken will cause a Gnaw Sting and/or Lesser Sting to be summoned. If this unit is Weakness Broken while in the Multiply state, it will reduce all friendly units' Toughness by an amount equal to this unit's Max Toughness and increase the DMG taken by all other friendly units besides the target themselves.

8025011.Name: Sky-Shrouding Stardevourer Swarm
8025011.Introduction: The replica of the Emanator of Propagation cultivated by Ruan Mei, briefly manifesting in the world in an incomplete form. Its original form is a giant lepisma that inherited the mandibles of the Imperator Insectorum. It can collect in its mouthparts the death ray that fragmented celestial bodies, and make shattered stars incubators for procreating offspring. It was once one of the nightmares across multiple worlds during the Swarm Disaster.

SkillList.Name: Swarm King Cannon
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Quantum DMG to one designated target

SkillList.Name: Radiating Venom
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Quantum DMG to one designated target, with a high chance of inflicting Entanglement. Also summons 1 "Gnaw Sting."

SkillList.Name: Pyrolysis Death Beam
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Quantum DMG to one designated target and adjacent targets.

SkillList.Name: Cannibalism
SkillList.SkillDesc: Consumes "Insect Egg" to enhance Swarm summons.

SkillList.Name: Ovum of Collapsed Star
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Quantum DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: Nesting Incubation
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Charging state. Gains Toughness Protection and a certain number of "Insect Eggs," lasting until the next action. During the next action, uses "Ovum of Collapsed Star" on all targets.

SkillList.Name: Devoured by the Swarm
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons Swarm summons after being attacked. When this unit's Weakness is Broken, deals Quantum DMG to all friendly units, and all friendly units (except this unit) take more DMG and become Weakness Broken.

SkillList.Name: Infinite Propagation
SkillList.SkillDesc: Gain a set amount of "Insect Egg" at the end of every turn. Lose 1 "Insect Egg" when attacked by "Entomon Eulogy" or "Decay Eulogy."

8032010.Name: Grunt: Field Personnel
8032010.Introduction: An Interastral Peace Corporation grunt worker whose job mainly deals with shady "business oversights." With a meager salary, the only lodging they can afford is a shared room on one of the IPC's enterprise ships.

SkillList.Name: Clock In
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Performance Boost
SkillList.SkillDesc: Receives 1 Performance Point after unleashing an attack. Performance Points can be seized by the attacker when this unit's Weakness is Broken or this unit receives a killing blow.

8032020.Name: Grunt: Security Personnel
8032020.Introduction: An Interastral Peace Corporation grunt worker whose job mainly involves maintaining order in locations ruled by the IPC. With a meager salary, the only lodging they can afford is a shared room on one of the IPC's enterprise ships.

SkillList.Name: Appeal
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

SkillList.Name: Performance Boost
SkillList.SkillDesc: Receives 1 Performance Point after unleashing an attack. Performance Points can be seized by the attacker when this unit's Weakness is Broken or this unit receives a killing blow.

8032030.Name: "All or Nothing"
8032030.Introduction: A game die metamorphosed from the "Aventurine of Stratagems," which shall decide the gamblers' destiny in the Gamble.

SkillList.Name: Fickle Fortune
SkillList.SkillDesc: Immune to DMG. When this unit is attacked by a target that has entered the Gamble, apply 1 random number (between 1 and 6) to the target.

8032031.Name: "All or Nothing"
8032031.Introduction: A game die metamorphosed from the "Aventurine of Stratagems," which shall decide the gamblers' destiny in the Gamble.

SkillList.Name: Fickle Fortune
SkillList.SkillDesc: HP cannot be reduced to lower than 1. When this unit is attacked by a target that has entered the Gamble, the target will receive a random number between 1 and 6. When HP is reduced to 1, gains the <u>Influx of Fortuity</u> effect. While under the <u>Influx of Fortuity</u> effect, this unit is guaranteed to receive the number 6 and uses Punishment of Defeat when the Gamble ends.

SkillList.Name: Punishment of Defeat
SkillList.SkillDesc: Self-destructs, dealing Imaginary DMG to Aventurine of Stratagems.

SkillList.Name: Forever Concealed
SkillList.SkillDesc: When this unit is attacked by a target that has entered the Gamble, the Gamble's odds are doubled.

While under the <u>Influx of Fortuity</u> effect, this unit is guaranteed to receive the number 6 and uses Punishment of Defeat when the Gamble ends.

8032033.Name: "All or Nothing"
8032033.Introduction: A game die metamorphosed from "Daring Diceroller," which shall decide the gamblers' destiny in the Gamble.

SkillList.Name: Bet
SkillList.SkillDesc: After being defeated, this unit's Points will be added to targets. At the same time, reduces Daring Diceroller's Toughness, and causes them to lose a certain amount of HP.

8032034.Name: "All or Nothing: Double Fortune"
8032034.Introduction: A game die metamorphosed from "Daring Diceroller," which shall decide the gamblers' destiny in the Gamble.

SkillList.Name: Temporary Good Fortune
SkillList.SkillDesc: When taking action, this unit leaves the battle.

SkillList.Name: Double Bet
SkillList.SkillDesc: After being defeated, targets' Points will double. At the same time, reduces Daring Diceroller's Toughness, and causes them to lose a certain amount of HP.

8033010.Name: Senior Staff: Team Leader
8033010.Introduction: An Interastral Peace Corporation senior staff member with a minimal rank of project team leader. The mech they drive belongs to the IPC. If damaged, its repair fees have to be paid out-of-pocket. With a half-decent salary, they can at least afford to rent a one-bedroom apartment on one of the IPC's enterprise ships.

SkillList.Name: Cost Reduction
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Charging state. Uses Work Culture Shock in the next action.

SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: <unbreak>720</unbreak>-Degree Review
SkillList.SkillDesc: Seizes all Performance Points from Grunt: Field Personnel and Grunt: Security Personnel.

8034010.Name: Ten Stonehearts: Aventurine of Stratagems
8034010.Introduction: A senior manager in the IPC Strategic Investment Department and one of the Ten Stonehearts. Using his Cornerstone, he obtained a share of the authority of an Emanator of Preservation. He throws his own body into the game as a die, ready to face death in order to walk away alive.

SkillList.Name: Heavy Stakes
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Distributed Investment
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals successive minor Imaginary DMG to random targets.

SkillList.Name: Points Fountain
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to all targets and reduce all targets' Energy.

SkillList.Name: Time For A Bet
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons "All or Nothing" and makes a single target enter the Gamble. Every time an "All or Nothing" is attacked by a target that is in the Gamble, the target will receive a random number between 1 and 6. After a target that is in the Gamble has finished their turn, targets with numbers lower than "Aventurine of Stratagems" are considered to have lost the Gamble and will be attacked, while those with a number higher than "Aventurine of Stratagems" are considered to have won the Gamble and will have their Ultimate activated. At the same time, targets that have not entered the Gamble are afflicted with the "Look, Don't Speak" status, which is dispelled when the Gamble ends.

SkillList.Name: Big Spenders' Mad Party
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons "All or Nothing" and makes all targets enter the gamble. Every time an "All or Nothing" is attacked, the target that launched the attack will receive a random number between 1 and 6. The next time "Aventurine of Stratagems" takes a turn, targets with numbers lower than "Aventurine of Stratagems" are considered to have lost the bet and will be attacked, while targets with numbers higher than "Aventurine of Stratagems" are considered to have won the bet and will have their Ultimates activated.

SkillList.Name: The Loser's Time Is Over
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to a target that lost the Gamble, with a high chance of inflicting Imprisonment on the attacked target.

SkillList.Name: The Winner Takes It All
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets that lost the Gamble, with a high chance of inflicting Imprisonment on the attacked targets.

SkillList.Name: Stratagems' Wagering
SkillList.SkillDesc: Every time a target wins the Gamble, they receive the "Favored by Fortune" effect that increases their DMG dealt. Every time a target loses the Gamble, they receive the "Down on Your Luck" effect that increases DMG taken.

8034011.Name: Ten Stonehearts: Aventurine of Stratagems (Complete)
8034011.Introduction: A complete projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is a senior manager in the IPC Strategic Investment Department and one of the Ten Stonehearts. Using his Cornerstone, he obtained a share of the authority of an Emanator of Preservation. He throws his own body into the game as a die, ready to face death in order to walk away alive.

SkillList.Name: Heavy Stakes
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Distributed Investment
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals successive minor Imaginary DMG to random targets.

SkillList.Name: Points Fountain
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to all targets and reduce all targets' Energy.

SkillList.Name: Time For A Bet
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons "All or Nothing" and makes a single target enter the Gamble. Every time an "All or Nothing" is attacked by a target in the Gamble, the target that launched the attack will receive a random number between 1 and 6. When HP is reduced to 1, gains <u>Influx of Fortuity</u>. Each time the first "All or Nothing" is attacked, doubles the odds of the Gamble. After a target that is in the Gamble has finished their turn, targets with numbers lower than "Aventurine of Stratagems" are considered to have lost the Gamble and will be attacked, while those with a number higher than "Aventurine of Stratagems" are considered to have won the Gamble and will have their Ultimate activated. At the same time, targets that have not entered the Gamble are afflicted with the "Look, Don't Speak" status, which is dispelled when the Gamble ends.

SkillList.Name: Big Spenders' Mad Party
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons "All or Nothing" and makes all targets enter the gamble. Every time an "All or Nothing" is attacked, the target that launched the attack will receive a random number between 1 and 6. When HP is reduced to 1, gains <u>Influx of Fortuity</u>. Each time the first "All or Nothing" is attacked, doubles the odds of the Gamble. The next time "Aventurine of Stratagems" takes a turn, targets with numbers lower than "Aventurine of Stratagems" are considered to have lost the bet and will be attacked, while targets with numbers higher than "Aventurine of Stratagems" are considered to have won the bet and will have their Ultimates activated.

SkillList.Name: The Mad Abyss
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons "All or Nothing," multiplies the numbers received, and makes all targets enter the gamble. Every time an "All or Nothing" is attacked, the target that launched the attack will receive a random number between 1 and 6. When HP is reduced to 1, gains <u>Influx of Fortuity</u>. Each time the first "All or Nothing" is attacked, doubles the odds of the Gamble. The next time "Aventurine of Stratagems" takes a turn, if the sum of all targets' numbers is lower than that of "Aventurine of Stratagems," they are considered to have lost the bet and will be attacked. If the sum of all targets' numbers is higher than that of "Aventurine of Stratagems," they are considered to have won the bet and will have their Ultimates activated.

SkillList.Name: The Loser's Time Is Over
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to a target that lost the Gamble, with a high chance of inflicting Imprisonment on the attacked target.

SkillList.Name: The Winner Takes It All
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets that lost the Gamble, with a high chance of inflicting Imprisonment on the attacked targets.

SkillList.Name: Eyes Once Closed for Lies
SkillList.SkillDesc: The initial odds for the gamble is 1, up to a maximum of 4. Every time a target wins the gamble, they receive a number of <u>Fenge's Gift</u> stacks equal to the odds. Every time a target loses the gamble, they receive a number of <u>Fenge's Curse</u> stacks equal to the odds.

SkillList.Name: Eyes Twice Closed for Trickery
SkillList.SkillDesc: The initial odds for the gamble is 1, up to a maximum of 8. Every time a target wins the gamble, they receive a number of <u>Fenge's Gift</u> stacks equal to the odds. Every time a target loses the gamble, they receive a number of <u>Fenge's Curse</u> stacks equal to the odds.

SkillList.Name: Eyes Thrice Closed for Schemes
SkillList.SkillDesc: The initial odds for the gamble is 1, up to a maximum of <unbreak>16</unbreak>. Every time a target wins the gamble, all targets receive a number of <u>Fenge's Gift</u> stacks equal to the odds. Every time a target loses the gamble, all targets receive a number of <u>Fenge's Curse</u> stacks equal to the odds.

SkillList.Name: Deep in Debt
SkillList.SkillDesc: Aventurine of Stratagems' DMG increases every time the gamble is initiated.

SkillList.Name: Betting the Flop
SkillList.SkillDesc: Activate two "All or Nothing," locks on to a single target, and uses Daring Wager on the locked-on target in the next turn. Defeat all activated "All or Nothing" monsters to prevent the use of Daring Wager and to activate a single target's Ultimate.

SkillList.Name: Go All In
SkillList.SkillDesc: Activates all "All or Nothing" and uses Doomed to Lose in the next action. Defeat all activated "All or Nothing" to prevent the use of Doomed to Lose and to activate all targets' Ultimate.

SkillList.Name: Daring Wager
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single locked-on target and has a high chance of inflicting Imprisonment.

SkillList.Name: Doomed to Lose
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets and has a high chance of inflicting Imprisonment.

SkillList.Name: Points
SkillList.SkillDesc: In the battle, all units gain a set number of Points that resets between Phases. When targets' Points are lower than friendly units', DMG received by friendly units is greatly reduced, and gains Toughness Protection. When targets' Points are equal to friendly units or more, DMG received by friendly units is increased.

SkillList.Name: Call
SkillList.SkillDesc: At the start of the Phase or when summons are defeated, summons up to <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> "All or Nothing."

SkillList.Name: Blind Bet
SkillList.SkillDesc: At the start of the Phase or when summons are defeated, summons up to <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> "All or Nothing" or "All or Nothing: Double Fortune."

SkillList.Name: Icy Wind
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Ice DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: Frigid Gaze
SkillList.SkillDesc: Locks on to a target. Some of Cocolia (Illusion)'s abilities will be released for one more time on the locked-on target until Ice Edge (Illusion) had their Weakness Broken or defeated.

100201601.Name: Ice Edge (Illusion)

100203001.Name: Silvermane Cannoneer
100203001.Introduction:
A cannoneer of the Silvermane Guards who wields a portable hand cannon into battle.
During combat, Silvermane Cannoneers will launch brutal chain attacks with their allies.

SkillList.Name: Barrage
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

SkillList.Name: Covering Support
SkillList.SkillDesc: Provides support to a friendly unit. When this unit attacks, it performs a follow-up attack that deals minor Physical DMG to the attacked target and units adjacent to the target.

100206401.Name: IPC Team Leader Illusion
100206401.Introduction: An Interastral Peace Corporation senior staff member with a minimal rank of project team leader. The mech they drive belongs to the IPC. If damaged, its repair fees have to be paid out-of-pocket. With a half-decent salary, they can at least afford to rent a one-bedroom apartment on one of the IPC's enterprise ships.

SkillList.Name: Everwinter Reverberance
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to all targets and delays the target team's actions.

100301001.Name: Silvermane Officer Dunn
100301001.Introduction:
The leader of a squad of Belobog's Silvermane Guards.
Silvermane Lieutenants can raise a giant shield during combat and Enhance themselves. Attacking a Silvermane Lieutenant with their shield raised will immediately result in a fierce Counter.

SkillList.Name: Assault
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Pierce
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Physical DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Shield Reflect
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Counter state. When attacked by a single character, acts immediately and casts "Pierce" on the attacker.

SkillList.Name: Reinforcement
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons Silvermane Soldiers or Silvermane Gunners

SkillList.Name: Reinforcement
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons Silvermane Soldiers or Silvermane Gunners

100301101.Name: Silvermane Lieutenant (Bug)
100301101.Introduction:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is the leader of a squad of Belobog's Silvermane Guards.
As long as there are remaining friendly units, Silvermane Lieutenants will persistently raise a giant shield during combat. Attacking a Silvermane Lieutenant with their shield raised will result in a fierce counterattack.

SkillList.Name: Assault
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Pierce
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Physical DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Shield Reflect
SkillList.SkillDesc: Goes into the Counter state. When attacked by a single character, gains 1 extra turn and deals Physical DMG to the target.

SkillList.Name: Reinforcement
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons Silvermane Soldiers or Silvermane Gunners

SkillList.Name: Rallying
SkillList.SkillDesc: Increases ATK for all friendly units except Silvermane Lieutenant (Error) and causes them to act immediately.

100401001.Name: Cocolia
100401001.Introduction:
The Guardian of Belobog, and the indisputable ruler of the Towering Citadel, Belobog.
Cocolia possesses the divine authority passed down through the generations of Guardians, giving her command over ice and snow to freeze her enemies in battle.

SkillList.Name: Chill of Bone-Piercing Coagulation
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Ice DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Omen of Everlasting Freeze
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons Ice Edges.

SkillList.Name: Punishment of Endless Winter
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Ice DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: Hoarfrost of Eternal Isolation
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Ice DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Freeze the target.

SkillList.Name: Wrath of Winterland Saints
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Charging state. The next action casts "Punishment of Endless Winter" on all targets.

100401401.Name: Annihilator of Desolation Mistral
100401401.Introduction: The Annihilator of Desolation Mistral possesses the divine authority passed down through the generations of Guardians, giving her command over ice and snow to freeze her enemies in battle.

SkillList.Name: Chill of Bone-Piercing Coagulation
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Ice DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Omen of Everlasting Freeze
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons Ice Edges.

SkillList.Name: Punishment of Endless Winter
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals massive Ice DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: Hoarfrost of Eternal Isolation
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Ice DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Freeze the target.

SkillList.Name: Wrath of Winterland Saints
SkillList.SkillDesc: Enters the Charging state. The next action casts "Punishment of Endless Winter" on all targets.

SkillList.Name: Reverberating Ice
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Ice DMG to Frozen targets and units adjacent to the target. This also removes the primary target's Frozen state. If the adjacent units are frozen, then this ability is used again on the primary target.

SkillList.Name: Intensifying Cold
SkillList.SkillDesc: For every target that gets Frozen, increases the DMG dealt by this unit and the summons.

SkillList.Name: Shield of the Winterlands
SkillList.SkillDesc: Gepard joins the battle.

SkillList.Name: Unstoppable Momentum
SkillList.SkillDesc: Damage received by Annihilator of Desolation Mistral is greatly reduced. However, after being Weakness Broken, its action is additionally delayed and it receives more DMG, as well as recovering allies' Skill Points and activating all allies' Ultimates.

SkillList.Name: Desolation Mistral
SkillList.SkillDesc: The Annihilator of Desolation Mistral will <u>transfer</u> their own Weakness-Type to "Ice Edge." When "Ice Edge" is defeated, Annihilator of Desolation Mistral will take additional Toughness Reduction.

SkillList.Name: Nowhere to Escape
SkillList.SkillDesc: When Annihilator of Desolation Mistral uses Chill of Bone-Piercing Coagulation or Hoarfrost of Eternal Isolation, these abilities will be <u>unleashed additional times</u> against targets locked on by Ice Edge.

SkillList.Name: Tenacious Resolve
SkillList.SkillDesc: Reduces DMG received by all friendly units, but every Weakness-Type they have increases DMG received.

100402001.Name: Gepard
100402001.Introduction:
Captain of the Silvermane Guards.
Gepard can command his soldiers to focus their attacks, and provide each of them with a barrier that blocks one attack.

SkillList.Name: Fist of Conviction
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Ice DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Smite of Frost
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Ice DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Garrison Aura Field
SkillList.SkillDesc: Grants a Barrier to another friendly unit. The Barrier nullifies all DMG received except for DoT until after the friendly unit is attacked.

SkillList.Name: Frigid Waterfall
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Ice DMG to all targets.

SkillList.Name: Siege Support
SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons Silvermane Gunners or Silvermane Cannoneers and Locks Onto a single target for all attacks.

100402201.Name: Gepard (Complete)
100402201.Introduction:
A complete projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is the leader of the Silvermane Guards.
Gepard (Complete) can command his soldiers to focus their attacks and offer soldiers a shield to block attacks.

SkillList.Name: Fist of Conviction
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals minor Ice DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Smite of Frost
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Ice DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Garrison Aura Field
SkillList.SkillDesc: Unleashes the Collective Shield and absorbs DMG taken by all friendly units, as well as preventing all friendly units from receiving damage to their Toughness.

SkillList.Name: Frigid Waterfall
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Ice DMG to all targets and slightly increases the DMG dealt. This DMG boosting effect is stackable.

SkillList.Name: Besiege
SkillList.SkillDesc: Gepard Locks On a single target, causing all friendly units to immediately launch coordinated attacks on the target.

SkillList.Name: Tit for Tat
SkillList.SkillDesc: Goes into the Counter state for 1 turn. If attacked by a target while in this state, immediately use "Smite of Frost" on the attacker. This effect can only be triggered 1 time.

SkillList.Name: Support
SkillList.SkillDesc: When the phase starts, immediately summons Silvermane Soldiers or Silvermane Cannoneers.

SkillList.Name: Support
SkillList.SkillDesc: When the phase starts, immediately summons Silvermane Cannoneers.

SkillList.Name: Support
SkillList.SkillDesc: When the phase starts, immediately summons Silvermane Lieutenant (Complete).

100403001.Name: Bronya
100403001.Introduction:
Successor to Belobog's Guardian, and commander of the Silvermane Guards.
Bronya can use various tactics to attack her enemies, and greatly enhance the battle prowess of all allies.

SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Wind DMG to a single target.

SkillList.Name: Combat Redeployment
SkillList.SkillDesc: Dispels all debuffs on a friendly unit except Bronya, and causes them to take action immediately.

SkillList.SkillDesc: Summons Silvermane Soldiers or Silvermane Gunners

SkillList.Name: Suppressive Fire
SkillList.SkillDesc: Deals Wind DMG to a single target and delays their action.
